Take the original resume content and the job posting details 2. Recreate and enhance the resume to tailor and match the job requirements of the posting 3. Keep all original sections: Summary, Experience, Education, Skills, Projects, Awards & Certifications 4. Improve the content to highlight relevant skills and experiences 5. Maintain the professional structure and formatting 6. Output the COMPLETE enhanced resume with ALL sections 7. DO NOT include the Complementary Skillsets portion of the resume. That is only there as add ons to assist with tailoring the resume. IMPORTANT FORMATTING RULES: - Output ONLY clean HTML content, no markdown formatting - Do NOT include ```html or ``` or backticks in your response - Do NOT include the word "html" at the beginning EXAMPLE STRUCTURE:

json.title: Freelance AI-Augmented Developer - Vibe Coding & Script Automation
json.descriptionHtml:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. Please submit your resume in English and indicate your level of English.

Mindrift is looking for passionate freelance contributors to join the Tendem project (https://tendem.ai/) and help shape the future of hybrid agents — where human expertise and Vibe Coding work together seamlessly.

As a Vibe Coding Expert, you'll partner with systems that take on repetitive tasks, while you provide the nuance, judgment, and creativity needed to deliver outstanding results.

In this role, you won't just refine what Vibe Coding generates — you'll actively collaborate with it, shaping and completing outputs so they are accurate, reliable, and ready for real-world use. Your day-to-day work may range from tackling complex challenges across different domains with the support of automation, to producing well-reasoned, precise, and clearly written outputs backed by credible sources.

This flexible, part-time remote opportunity is ideal for professionals with technical expertise and hands-on experience in scripting, automation, or AI-driven tools. Your contributions will directly influence how Vibe Coding systems evolve, learn, and empower industries worldwide.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

This is a freelance role for a project, and your typical tasks may include:

  • Your mission - deliver well-reasoned, accurate, and clearly written outputs backed by credible sources.
  • Solve complex tasks in different domains with the help of automations
  • Develop and submit precise answers based on complex prompts, including coding, automation, and data processing tasks.
  • Write and optimize Python scripts for data analysis, automation, and verification.
  • Work with large datasets efficiently, ensuring data is clean and well-structured.
  • Utilize various LLMs to generate advanced prompts and improve AI output quality.
  • Format outputs in required structures such as Markdown, JSON, tables, etc.
  • Identify and troubleshoot non-trivial technical problems related to AI workflows and integrations.

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects that match your technical skills, on your own schedule. From coding and automation to fine-tuning AI outputs, you'll play a key role in advancing AI capabilities and real-world applications.

Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or related technical fields
  • You have a minimum of 1 year of professional experience in AI automation, data engineering, or software development is desirable
  • Your level of English is upper-intermediate (B2) or above
  • Strong data analysis and automation skills, with experience in scripting (e.g., Python) for task efficiency.
  • Proficient in working with large datasets and integrating data from multiple sources
  • Ability to develop, test, and optimize AI-driven workflows and tools.
  • Detail-oriented mindset to ensure accuracy and quality in data processing and output
  • Hands-on experience with LLMs and AI frameworks to enhance automation and problem-solving
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $20/hour depending on your skills, experience, and project needs
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companySlogan: Be the “I” in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects
json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift — a space where innovation meets opportunity. We’re a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks — ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let’s build the future of AI together, one task at a time.

json.title: Freelance ServiceNow Consultant - AI Trainer
json.descriptionHtml:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. Please submit your resume in English and indicate your level of English.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in ServiceNow, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Review pre-generated intents and transform them into a logical sequence of agent steps
  • Define a test case: dialogue flow (user request, intermediate steps, agent's final response)
  • Create a Golden Path: the optimal sequence of tools the agent should invoke
  • Write User Agent instructions to ensure consistent and correct automated behavior

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects that match your technical skills, on your own schedule. From coding and automation to fine-tuning AI outputs, you'll play a key role in advancing AI capabilities and real-world applications.

Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Business Administration and/or any relevant area.
  • You have a minimum of 3 year of professional experience, including ServiceNow admin/configuration:
    • Setting up ticket forms, triggers, macros, and automation;
    • Managing groups, roles, and permissions;
    • Configuring multiple departments or business units within a single Zendesk instance (multi-brand / multi-department setup)
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $45/hour depending on your skills, experience, location and project
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.title: Test Automation Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.  

Sogeti

As Test Automation Engineer, you are involved in the automated verification and validation of products made by engineers in a development process. Your technical and professional knowledge of Test Automation, programming, test environments and methodologies is solid. With your knowledge and experience with one or more test tools and test techniques, you can independently design and execute test automation solutions. You follow the latest developments in your field and you know what is going on.

Job Description

VOTRE RÔLE, VOTRE AVENIR

En tant que testeur automaticien / testeuse automaticienne, vous interviendrez dans un environnement agile sur l’ensemble des aspects liés aux métiers du test.

Vos Principales Missions Seront

  • Ecriture des campagnes de tests
  • Implémenter des tests API avec Cucumber et Postman
  • Saisie et suivi des anomalies dans Service Now
  • Analyse des problèmes et support à la recette
  • Préparation des environnement de tests
  • Rédaction de procédures d’exploitation
  • Communiquer les bilans des campagnes de tests
  • Concevoir les scénarios de tests ou scripts de tests automatisés
  • Identifier des pré-requis et jeux de données nécessaires à l'exécution des tests
  • Fiabiliser et rendre plus robustes les scripts d'automatisation

Environnement technique : Git, kubernetes, Jenkins, HP ALM, Service Now, Cucumber, Selenium

La certification ISTQB et la pratique dans un environnement Agile seront des atouts pour postuler sur ce poste.

De formation BAC +5, vous justifiez d'une première expérience dans le métier du Test Logiciel.

Organisé(e) et doté(e) d'un bon relationnel, votre rigueur et votre sens du service sont autant d'atouts qui vous permettront d'évoluer rapidement au sein de Sogeti.

LES PLUS DU POSTE

  • Intégrer une entreprise qui favorise l’épanouissement professionnel / personnel et partager des moments de convivialité entre collègues par le biais d’un CE attractif (voyages, tickets de cinéma...), afterworks et événements sportifs.
  • Réaliser de nombreuses formations : chez Sogeti au-delà des nombreuses certifications nous vous accompagnons sur la partie culturelle, environnementale et mobilité : permis bateau/moto, voyage linguistique, développement personnel, cours de pâtisserie...
  • Favoriser un équilibre de vie : accord de télétravail (jusqu'à 70%), aménagement du temps de travail, accord parentalité, et congés d’anciennetés (8 jours de congés supplémentaires)
  • Un complément de rémunération : prime de cooptation jusqu'à 3500€ ; possibilité d'actionnariat, prime d'intéressement et de participation et PERCOL avec l'abondement de l'entreprise !

3 Raisons Pour Nous Rejoindre

Qualité de vie au travail : accord de télétravail (jusqu'à 70%) en France et à l’international, accord sur l’égalité professionnelle, la parentalité, l’équilibre des temps et la mobilité durable.

Apprentissage en continu : certifications techniques et formations en libre accès, accompagnement sur mesure avec votre career manager, parcours d’intégration sur 9 mois.

Avantages groupe & CSE : plan actionnariat, PERCOL, CE attractif avec des tarifs préférentiels (voyages, concerts, tickets de cinéma...), remboursement partiel vacances, remboursement de votre abonnement sportif ou culturel et développement personnel (formations permis de conduire, cours de pâtisserie, nutrition...).

Nos Engagements Et Priorites

Le groupe Capgemini encourage une culture inclusive dans un cadre multiculturel et handi-accueillant. En nous rejoignant, vous intégrez un collectif qui valorise la diversité, développe le potentiel de ses talents, s’engage dans des initiatives solidaires avec ses partenaires, et se mobilise pour réduire son impact environnemental sur tous ses sites et auprès de ses clients.

Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.

json.title: Freelance ServiceNow Consultant - AI Trainer
json.descriptionHtml:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. Please submit your resume in English and indicate your level of English.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in ServiceNow, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Review pre-generated intents and transform them into a logical sequence of agent steps
  • Define a test case: dialogue flow (user request, intermediate steps, agent's final response)
  • Create a Golden Path: the optimal sequence of tools the agent should invoke
  • Write User Agent instructions to ensure consistent and correct automated behavior

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects that match your technical skills, on your own schedule. From coding and automation to fine-tuning AI outputs, you'll play a key role in advancing AI capabilities and real-world applications.

Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Business Administration and/or any relevant area.
  • You have a minimum of 3 year of professional experience, including ServiceNow admin/configuration:
    • Setting up ticket forms, triggers, macros, and automation;
    • Managing groups, roles, and permissions;
    • Configuring multiple departments or business units within a single Zendesk instance (multi-brand / multi-department setup)
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $45/hour depending on your skills, experience, location and project
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companySlogan: Be the “I” in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects
json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift — a space where innovation meets opportunity. We’re a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks — ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let’s build the future of AI together, one task at a time.

json.title: Automation Software Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
About Us

At Harmattan AI, we are a next-generation defense prime building autonomous and scalable defense systems. Driven by rigorous engineering developments of new defense products based on recent robotics and AI developments, we are on a steep growth trajectory. If you are interested in a career in a highly technical environment, thrive on pushing boundaries, and want to achieve ambitious goals, we would love to hear from you.

About The Role

As an Automation Software Engineer, you will play a key role in designing and developing the software that powers our automated testing and inspection platforms. Working within the R&D department, you will create robust, scalable automation tools that support both product development and manufacturing operations. Your primary focus will be software development for test automation, while also collaborating on mechanical and electrical integration aspects of test systems.

Responsibilities

  • Test Automation Development – Design, implement, and maintain automated test and inspection software, primarily using Python.
  • Data Acquisition & Analysis – Build tools for real-time data collection, visualization, and analysis to improve product validation and process efficiency.
  • System Integration – Interface with sensors, cameras, motion controllers, and other hardware components to create fully automated testing workflows.
  • Test Fixture Collaboration – Work with mechanical and electrical engineers to design and integrate physical test fixtures when needed.
  • Cross-Team Collaboration – Partner with product development, manufacturing, and quality teams to deliver reliable and maintainable automation solutions.

Candidate Requirements

  • MSc in Software, Electrical, Mechatronics, or related engineering field.
  • Top level Python programming skills, including experience with automation frameworks, hardware communication protocols and data processing.
  • Experience developing automated test systems, measurement setups, or manufacturing automation tools.
  • Familiarity with version control (Git) and structured software development practices.
  • Comfortable with CAD tools (SolidWorks, Onshape or similar).
  • Comfortable performing soldering, wiring, and small-scale electrical circuit work for test system integration.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to design practical, robust engineering solutions.
  • Excellent communication skills and proven ability to collaborate across multidisciplinary teams.

Location and Commitments

  • Contract Type: Permanent contract (CDI)
  • Work Schedule: Full-time
  • Availability: ASAP
  • Location: Paris

We look forward to hearing how you can help shape the future of autonomous defense systems at Harmattan AI.

json.companySlogan: Building the Future of Autonomous Warfare. With Speed and Intelligence.
json.companyDescription:
Harmattan AI is rising as a next-generation defense prime, building the future of autonomous warfare.
We leverage AI-driven autonomy, real-time intelligence, and conflict-ready production to deliver attritable systems and autonomous mission management software. 
Designed for the real-world needs of warfighters, our solutions enable faster deployment, sharper decision-making, and battlefield dominance.

json.title: Data and AI Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
Coders Connect are partnering with Sanofi


Sanofi is a global biopharmaceutical company focused on human health. Through science and technology, they deliver life-changing medicines and vaccines to fight pain, ease suffering, and improve lives. Digital & Data is central to their vision: building leading digital healthcare platforms, accelerating drug discovery, and enhancing patient outcomes through data, AI, and advanced analytics.


Main responsibilities:

  • Work with cross-functional teams to build and maintain scalable data pipelines.
  • Design and optimize ETL processes in AWS for data transformation, ingestion, and governance.
  • Enable integration of regulatory data into the Knowledge Graph.
  • Support ML workflows by providing clean, structured data and deploying models into production.
  • Ensure compliance with GxP, SOX, and data privacy standards.
  • Contribute to DataOps and MLOps best practices using GitHub CI/CD, Airflow, and containerized deployments.


Requirements:

You are a proactive Data Engineer with experience delivering reliable data pipelines, driving automation, and supporting analytics and AI initiatives within a highly regulated environment. You are collaborative, solutions-focused, and committed to data quality, governance, and security.


Experience & skills:

  • Strong background in automation, data models, and query optimization.
  • Experience with compliance and cybersecurity; healthcare industry exposure is a plus.
  • Proficient in AWS, SQL, data warehousing (Snowflake preferred), and Python or R.
  • Familiar with GitHub, PowerBI/Tableau, and monitoring tools (Datadog, Splunk).
  • Knowledge of real-world healthcare data (EHR, Claims) and standards (OMOP, FHIR).
  • Excellent communication, problem solving, and team collaboration skills.


Education & languages:

  • Degree in computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
  • Fluent in English and French.

json.companyDescription:
Coders Connect was formed from a technology community that has a focus on Software Engineering, Data Engineering, DevOps, QA Automation and Data Science. We provide a full hiring lifecycle experience. Everything from talent identification to offer management and most importantly, onboarding to aftercare and satisfaction - with everything in between.

Coders Connect started out as a dev community and now we are brilliantly placed to tap into some of the richest dev hot-spots. We continue to grow in our constantly evolving marketplace. We have broadened our vision and increased our capabilities to add more value to our communities.

Our tech communities are strongest in Software Engineering, Data Engineering, DevOps, QA Automation and Data Science. Need a change? Need talent? Our communities grow every day, our ability to deliver quality at speed is something that has proven valuable to many leading tech firms and technologists worldwide.

json.title: Internship - Global Learning & Development F/H/X - Corporate
json.descriptionHtml:
CHANEL stands as an iconic symbol of luxury and innovation in the fashion industry. With a legacy that spans over a century, CHANEL continues to set the standard for elegance and sophistication. Our commitment to excellence extends to our Learning and Development (L&D) initiatives, where we seek to nurture our talents and uphold a culture of continuous improvement and growth.

About The Job

CHANEL is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented intern to join the Global Learning & Development team. The intern will assist in shaping the Future of Learning at CHANEL by supporting the development and adoption of a unified Learning platform, helping optimize the worldwide L&D organization, contributing to the creation of robust data and analytics capabilities, testing and scaling automation and gen AI technologies.

YOUR IMPACT AT CHANEL


  • Define and implement simple, yet effective, solutions to optimize the Learning organization's processes, aiming to improve the overall Learner Experience.
  • Assist in the development and adoption of a global learning platform (LMS), ensuring deep stakeholder engagement and seamless access to learning resources for all employees.
  • Collaborate closely with IT and Tech Innovation teams to develop, test, and evaluate simple solutions that could be piloted during the internship and, upon success, scaled and introduced to the Learning Directors of the company.
  • Manage and lead projects related to Gen AI, Low-code, and automation to drive innovation and efficiency within the Learning domain.
  • Help building our data capabilities, analyze L&D data to track progress, assess the effectiveness of learning initiatives, and generate actionable insights that lead to continuous improvement in our learning strategies.


What You Will Bring


  • Currently enrolled in or a recent graduate of a degree program related to Education Technology, Information Technology, Business, Project Management, or a related field.
  • Strong interest in technology, AI, low-code and automation.
  • Great problem-solving abilities and creative mindset, with an openness to learning and applying new technologies and methodologies.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams.
  • Proficiency in project management; experience with L&D trends and technologies is a plus.
  • Fluency in English; proficiency in French is a plus.


What Chanel Can Offer You


  • A pivotal moment of growth and dynamic transformation
  • A dynamic, creative, and supportive work environment.
  • The opportunity to work on meaningful projects that impact the organization globally.
  • Exposure to industry-leading practices in L&D and talent management.
  • A culture that values diversity, innovation, and personal development.
  • Networking opportunities within a prestigious luxury brand.

json.industries: Retail and Retail Luxury Goods and Jewelry
json.companyDescription:
Chanel is a private company and world leader in creating, manufacturing and distributing luxury products, including Ready-to-Wear, Accessories, Fragrances, Makeup, Skincare, Jewellery and Watches. Founded by Gabrielle Chanel in 1910, the House remains dedicated to exceptional craftsmanship and offering high-end creations. Chanel employs more than 32,000 people worldwide.​
​

As part of this, the House promotes arts, culture and creativity, while investing significantly in key areas including research & development, sustainability, and innovation.​
​

Chanel is dedicated to creating the conditions for people to perform at their best, building on their strengths and enabling them to benefit from new opportunities. It offers a unique working environment where people are given time to understand the brand, the business, and develop their personal motivations. This means everyone can grow, continue to be inspired and feel included, now and in the future. The company fosters true collaboration and respect for all, grounded in the belief that diversity is essential to the success of the organisation and its people.​
​

Chanel is committed to rewarding people competitively, as well as offering initiatives such as wellbeing programmes, learning and development opportunities, and parental leave for all parents globally.​

json.title: Test Automation Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.  

As Test Automation Engineer, you are involved in the automated verification and validation of products made by engineers in a development process. Your technical and professional knowledge of Test Automation, programming, test environments and methodologies is solid. With your knowledge and experience with one or more test tools and test techniques, you can independently design and execute test automation solutions. You follow the latest developments in your field and you know what is going on.

VOTRE RÔLE, VOTRE AVENIR

En tant que testeur automaticien / testeuse automaticienne, vous interviendrez dans un environnement agile sur l’ensemble des aspects liés aux métiers du test.

Vos Principales Missions Seront

  • Ecriture des campagnes de tests
  • Implémenter des tests API avec Cucumber et Postman
  • Saisie et suivi des anomalies dans Service Now
  • Analyse des problèmes et support à la recette
  • Préparation des environnement de tests
  • Rédaction de procédures d’exploitation
  • Communiquer les bilans des campagnes de tests
  • Concevoir les scénarios de tests ou scripts de tests automatisés
  • Identifier des pré-requis et jeux de données nécessaires à l'exécution des tests
  • Fiabiliser et rendre plus robustes les scripts d'automatisation

Environnement technique : Git, kubernetes, Jenkins, HP ALM, Service Now, Cucumber, Selenium

La certification ISTQB et la pratique dans un environnement Agile seront des atouts pour postuler sur ce poste.

De formation BAC +5, vous justifiez d'une première expérience dans le métier du Test Logiciel.

Organisé(e) et doté(e) d'un bon relationnel, votre rigueur et votre sens du service sont autant d'atouts qui vous permettront d'évoluer rapidement au sein de Sogeti.

LES PLUS DU POSTE

  • Intégrer une entreprise qui favorise l’épanouissement professionnel / personnel et partager des moments de convivialité entre collègues par le biais d’un CE attractif (voyages, tickets de cinéma...), afterworks et événements sportifs.
  • Réaliser de nombreuses formations : chez Sogeti au-delà des nombreuses certifications nous vous accompagnons sur la partie culturelle, environnementale et mobilité : permis bateau/moto, voyage linguistique, développement personnel, cours de pâtisserie...
  • Favoriser un équilibre de vie : accord de télétravail (jusqu'à 70%), aménagement du temps de travail, accord parentalité, et congés d’anciennetés (8 jours de congés supplémentaires)
  • Un complément de rémunération : prime de cooptation jusqu'à 3500€ ; possibilité d'actionnariat, prime d'intéressement et de participation et PERCOL avec l'abondement de l'entreprise !

3 Raisons Pour Nous Rejoindre

Qualité de vie au travail : accord de télétravail (jusqu'à 70%) en France et à l’international, accord sur l’égalité professionnelle, la parentalité, l’équilibre des temps et la mobilité durable.

Apprentissage en continu : certifications techniques et formations en libre accès, accompagnement sur mesure avec votre career manager, parcours d’intégration sur 9 mois.

Avantages groupe & CSE : plan actionnariat, PERCOL, CE attractif avec des tarifs préférentiels (voyages, concerts, tickets de cinéma...), remboursement partiel vacances, remboursement de votre abonnement sportif ou culturel et développement personnel (formations permis de conduire, cours de pâtisserie, nutrition...).

Nos Engagements Et Priorites

Le groupe Capgemini encourage une culture inclusive dans un cadre multiculturel et handi-accueillant. En nous rejoignant, vous intégrez un collectif qui valorise la diversité, développe le potentiel de ses talents, s’engage dans des initiatives solidaires avec ses partenaires, et se mobilise pour réduire son impact environnemental sur tous ses sites et auprès de ses clients.

Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.

json.title: AI Solutions Specialist - Presales
json.descriptionHtml:
AI Solutions Specialist -Presales

Salary + Benefits to be discussed over a call

Paris- Hybrid Options Available


Are you passionate about how AI can transform customer engagement?


We’re looking for a creative, commercially minded AI Solutions Specialist to join a fast-growing European leader in digital CX transformation. This is an opportunity to shape the future of intelligent customer interactions for some of the world’s most recognized brands.


As an AI Solutions Specialist, you’ll sit at the intersection of technology, business strategy, and customer experience.


You’ll help enterprise clients understand how Conversational AI, Generative AI, and automation can unlock measurable value across their contact centres and digital channels.


🌍 What You’ll Do


  • Lead discovery sessions with enterprise clients to uncover needs and opportunities for AI and automation.
  • Design and validate end-to-end AI architectures that are scalable, secure, and outcome-driven.
  • Support bids and proposals with credible technical and operational input.
  • Deliver compelling demos and presentations that show real business impact.
  • Collaborate with Solution Engineers on proof-of-concepts and client showcases.
  • Advise on AI trends, technologies, and best practices to shape go-to-market strategies.
  • Mentor colleagues and contribute to a culture of knowledge-sharing and enablement.


⚙️ What You Bring


  • Deep knowledge of Conversational AI, Generative AI, and automation frameworks.
  • Understanding of CX and contact centre ecosystems (CCaaS platforms like Genesys, NICE, Avaya, Five9, or Amazon Connect).
  • Experience designing or supporting enterprise-scale AI deployments.
  • Commercial acumen, including ROI modelling and TCO analysis.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills with executive audiences.
  • Ability to balance technical depth with business storytelling.
  • Leadership and mentoring capability within cross-functional teams.


🧠 Tech Stack Familiarity


  • AI/Automation: Conversational AI platforms, LLMs, agentic AI, RPA tools.
  • Cloud: AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
  • Integration: APIs, microservices, middleware.
  • Data: Advanced analytics and reporting tools.


🎓 Preferred Experience & Certifications


  • Experience in AI-enabled customer experience transformation.
  • Degree in Computer Science, AI, or related field (or equivalent practical experience).
  • Cloud, AI/ML, or CX vendor certifications (AWS/Azure/GCP, Genesys Cloud, OpenAI, Hugging Face, etc.).
  • Flexible / remote working options
  • Private healthcare and life insurance
  • Pension plan
  • Cycle-to-work scheme
  • 28 days paid annual leave (including company-wide wellbeing days)
  • Access to LinkedIn Learning and ongoing development programs


If you’re ready to shape the future of AI-driven customer experience and thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment — we’d love to hear from you.

We operate globally and work with a range of companies throughout Scotland, UK, Europe, US and Beyond. 

Providing Contract, Permanent and Executive Search sourcing capabilities across the AI, Data Science, Analytics, Technology and Digital sectors, MBN Solutions are the partner of choice for a variety of organisations in the UK, Europe and beyond who are looking for the solution to the increasingly complex challenges around Data Technology Talent Acquisition.

With a strong focus on “Community Building” and close collaboration with a large number of academic institutions, we help our clients solve not only today’s Data Technology Talent problems, but help position them for success tomorrow.

json.title: Freelance Zendesk Consultant - AI Trainer
json.descriptionHtml:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. Please submit your resume in English and indicate your level of English.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Zendesk, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Review pre-generated intents and transform them into a logical sequence of agent steps
  • Define a test case: dialogue flow (user request, intermediate steps, agent's final response).
  • Create a Golden Path: the optimal sequence of tools the agent should invoke
  • Write User Agent instructions to ensure consistent and correct automated behavior

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects that match your technical skills, on your own schedule. From coding and automation to fine-tuning AI outputs, you'll play a key role in advancing AI capabilities and real-world applications.

Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Business Administration and/or any relevant area.
  • You have a minimum of 3 year of professional experience, including Zendesk admin/configuration:
    • Setting up ticket forms, triggers, macros, and automation;
    • Managing groups, roles, and permissions;
    • Configuring multiple departments or business units within a single Zendesk instance (multi-brand / multi-department setup)
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $45/hour depending on your skills, experience, and project needs
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companySlogan: Be the “I” in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects
json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift — a space where innovation meets opportunity. We’re a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks — ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let’s build the future of AI together, one task at a time.

json.title: International Chief Information Officer
json.descriptionHtml:
As a true partner to senior management and a manager working closely with international teams, you will oversee the Group's IT activities worldwide, capitalising on existing teams and resources to ensure that the strategy is fully aligned with the vision of senior management.


Your responsibilities will include the following :

Strategy & Governance

- Define and steer the IT strategy in line with the business vision and priorities.

- Build an IT roadmap consistent with growth, customer experience and regulatory compliance challenges.

- Implement robust IT governance focused on performance, security and agility.

Transformation & Projects

- Steer strategic projects: R&D tools, CRM, ERP, invoicing.

- Oversee the deployment of innovative solutions.

- Ensure system interoperability and data flow optimisation.

- Develop a project culture based on ITIL, PMP and agile approaches.


Security & Reliability

- Ensure IT resilience: PRA/PCA supervision, security audits, risk management.

- Oversee cybersecurity and regulatory compliance (GDPR, NIS2).

- Monitor data quality, traceability and reliability.

Management & Change Management

- Support business lines in digital maturity and understanding IT issues.

- Drive change and create a climate conducive to collaboration and innovation.

Innovation & Technology Watch

- Identify and evaluate technological trends (AI, automation, data analytics).

- Guide technology investment decisions and accelerate digital transformation.

- Promote a pragmatic, value-oriented culture of innovation.


With 15 years of experience in IT departments, in an industrial context undergoing rapid restructuring or hypergrowth.

- Dual role: strategic and operational, capable of steering while remaining hands-on.

- Intrapreneurial vision, results- and impact-oriented.

- Natural leadership, team spirit, ease in collaborating with an executive committee.

- Solid technical foundation (infrastructure, data, ERP, cybersecurity, cloud).

json.title: Digital Transformation Jr Specialist
json.descriptionHtml:
Are you a business school graduate with a focus and interest in Change Management, Strategy & Innovation?


Have you worked in a consulting environment and are keen to enrich this experience by working in industry for a global Chemical Manufacturer?


We are currently hiring for an exciting role in our client’s Regulatory Affairs team. In a context of global expansive transformation projects, we are looking for a profile just like yours for a fixed term contract of 18 months.


In this position, you will be at the forefront of transforming regulatory processes, driving the implementation of innovative solutions, and will be contributing significantly to projects that streamline the management of compliance data, documentation, and workflows across the organization.

This role is particularly suited for you if you have enjoyed transformation and strategy projects in a consulting environment, and want to expand further in a global corporate and manufacturing environment, with a true opportunity to apply strategic and innovative thinking to regulatory operations.


The company is on an impactful journey and this is your chance to take part in it!


Your Key Missions

  • Support the transformation of Regulatory Affairs by designing and implementing tools, dashboards, and process automations.
  • Assist in creating internal platforms and smart agents to streamline document handling, compliance tracking, and regulatory submissions.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Regulatory, R&D, Quality, IT, and external consultants to co-build digital solutions.
  • Contribute to workflow optimization using agile methodologies and BPMN, improving visibility on timelines, tasks, and progress.
  • Help maintain and improve regulatory data systems (REACH, CLP, SDSs, product registration databases).
  • Assist in preparing reports, project documentation, and visual summaries of regulatory metrics and project health.
  • Explore and implement new technologies (e.g., AI, automation, low-code tools) to support regulatory operations.


Your Profile

  • Business School graduate (Strategy/Transformation/ Business Management or potentially Data Science)
  • Consulting Internship background with additional 0 to 2 years’ professional experience in change management or strategic operations projects in a consulting/industrial environment.
  • Interest in regulatory processes, chemical industry standards, and how digital tools can enhance compliance.
  • Comfortable working with data and willing to learn tools such as Excel, Power BI, Python, or low-code platforms.
  • Strong communicator, organized, and motivated to work in a collaborative, international environment. Previous experience with multi-stakeholder project leadership valuable.
  • Fluent in English; additional languages (French, German, Spanish) are a plus.


The position is based in Lyon, full time for a duration of 18 months, with the possibility of this position being made permanent in the future.


Applicants must be able to relocate or be located within the Lyon area.


Interested?

Apply now!


If your profile is matching, we will be in touch with you very quickly!

json.title: Machine Learning Engineer (All genders)
json.descriptionHtml:
Descriptif du poste

The Machine Learning Engineer will contribute to the design, implementation, and optimization of AI models applied to bacteriophage–host prediction and related biological datasets. This role is central to scaling our AI capabilities and ensuring efficient model deployment within production environments.

🧩 Main Responsibilities

  • Train, and deploy deep learning models to predict bacteriophage–host interactions.
  • Manage inference endpoints for scalable AI applications.
  • Collaborate with data scientists and bioinformaticians to improve model architectures and integrate diverse datasets.
  • Contribute to automation and continuous integration of ML pipelines.
  • Ensure code quality, reproducibility, and maintainability following best engineering practices.
  • Participate in cross-functional research projects in collaboration with the Data and Bioinformatics teams.

🌍 Why Join Us?

  • Work fully remote, hybrid, or onsite in Paris
  • Collaborate with talented internal teams and AWS experts
  • Take ownership of infrastructure critical to pioneering biotech innovation

🎁 Our Benefits

  • Healthcare 100% paid by Phagos
  • Swile card (restaurant vouchers)
  • RTT
  • Wellpass (ex Gymlib) subscription

Profil recherché

  • Technical Skills
  • Programming skills in Python
  • Machine learning and deep learning (PyTorch)
  • Experience with AWS services, especially SageMaker (deployment, training)
  • Cloud infrastructure knowledge (S3, EC2)
  • Experience with GPU distributed training
  • Model optimization and performance tuning
  • CI/CD, Git, Docker
  • Soft Skills
  • Curiosity and creativity to explore interdisciplinary challenges.
  • Proactive mindset and willingness to take initiative.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration with scientific and technical teams.
  • Problem-solving mindset and attention to detail.
  • Enjoys coding
  • Transversal Skills
  • Fluent in English (written and spoken).
  • Interest in biotechnology, bioinformatics, or life sciences applications.
  • Experience
  • Minimum 1 year of XP (if relevant Phd), if not at least 2/3 years of experience
  • Education
  • PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related quantitative discipline.

Déroulement des entretiens

At Phagos we believe the recruitment process begins from the application. This is why we invite you to take your time and thoughtfully complete our application form.

Once we select your profile, we are committed to make sure you have a positive and seamless experience !

Step #1 Screening Interview with Abbas, our ML Engineer,

Step #2 Technical interview with Abbas,

Step #3 Interview with Andrea, our Head of Data & AI,

Step #4 Meet our co-founders Adèle & Alex,

Team fit : Last but not least, you will meet 5 members of Phagos, randomly picked for a Teamfit discussion, in English as our team is international. When possible, this meeting will be held in our office in Suresnes.

Qui sont-ils ?

Phagos is on a mission to create a cleaner, more sustainable future by using bacteria’s natural predator, the bacteriophage, to win the fight against antibiotic resistance and cure infectious diseases. We use breakthrough technologies in both the wet lab and dry lab to generate customized treatments for pathogenic diseases at an unprecedented speed.

json.companySlogan: End Bacterial Disease
json.companyDescription:
We are facing a global crisis where bacterial infections are becoming increasingly deadly due to antibiotic resistance. The health and economic consequences are staggering, with bacterial disease predicted to be the #1 cause of death by 2050. Alternatives are urgently needed, but nature already has its solution: phages, the natural predators of bacteria.

At Phagos, we are bringing back phage technology by combining advances in microbiology with cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Our patented technology makes large-scale, customized phage-based veterinary medicines possible for the first time. And soon we'll universalize the technology for human health too.

Our mission is to end bacterial disease.

json.title: Open innovation manager
json.descriptionHtml:
As a global key player in yeasts and fermentation, Lesaffre designs, manufactures and markets innovative solutions for Baking, Food taste & pleasure, Health care and Biotechnology.

Family group born in northern France in 1853, now a multi-national and a multicultural company, Lesaffre is committed to working with confidence to better nourish and protect the planet.

In close collaboration with its clients and partners, Lesaffre employs 10 000 people in nearly 80 subsidiaries based in 50 countries.

Lesaffre achieves a turnover of 2 billion euros.

Job Description

At Lesaffre, we believe in shaping the future of fermentation and biotechnology to improve food, health, and well-being worldwide. As a global leader in yeast and fermentation solutions, we are committed to fostering innovation and leveraging digital transformation to drive sustainable growth.

Within this vision, the Open Innovation manager will play a pivotal role in driving external innovation, strategic partnerships, and digital adoption to accelerate Lesaffre’s impact across industries. This position requires working closely with internal stakeholders, research institutions, startups, and corporate partners to identify new opportunities, develop cutting-edge solutions, and strengthen Lesaffre’s position as an industry pioneer.

  • Lead Open Innovation Strategy & Execution
  • Develop and execute Lesaffre’s open innovation strategy, aligning it with DDTech & business objectives and priorities.
  • Identify and assess emerging technologies, business models, and innovation opportunities to serve DDTech team needs and Lesaffre’s core business and future growth.
  • Build and manage a structured innovation roadmap, supporting DDTech transformative initiatives or projects or /and exploratory business projects.
  • Establish and manage an open innovation governance framework, ensuring alignment with DDTech governance, corporate strategy and effective decision-making.
  • Promote a culture of innovation, fostering cross-functional collaboration to drive disruptive ideas.
  • Foster Strategic Partnerships & Ecosystem Engagement
  • Establish strong collaborations with startups, incubators, venture capital firms, universities, and research institutions to bring innovative solutions to Lesaffre.
  • Lead Lesaffre’s participation in accelerators, industry consortiums, and open innovation networks to access breakthrough technologies.
  • Act as a key interface, together with relevant DDTech stakeholders, between Lesaffre and external innovation ecosystems to ensure seamless integration of new technologies and business models.
  • Negotiate and structure strategic partnerships, and co-development agreements with external partners.
  • Business Impact & Digital Adoption
  • Work closely with Lesaffre’s DDTech Leadership teams, business units, R&D innovation teams, operations, marketing to ensure efforts are coordinated; aligned with needs and strategy
  • Contribute, together with DDTech responsibles to drive the adoption of new digital solutions, leveraging AI, automation, data analytics, and biotechnology advancements to enhance efficiency and competitiveness.
  • Support the implementation of new business models and go-to-market strategies for innovative products and services.
  • Ensure the successful scaling and commercialization of innovation projects by engaging with key stakeholders and securing funding where needed.
  • Thought Leadership & Knowledge Sharing
  • Act as an internal ambassador for innovation, promoting a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous learning within the organization.
  • Organize innovation workshops, hackathons, and training sessions to enhance internal capabilities.
  • Provide regular strategic insights on tech trends, market disruptions, and consumer behaviour shifts.
  • Develop internal reports and communication materials to share key innovation learnings across business units.

Qualifications

  • 7+ years of experience in innovation management, digital transformation, or working with startups/corporate innovation programs.
  • Strong entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for technology, sustainability, and industry disruption.
  • Proven ability to build and manage partnerships with external innovation ecosystems.
  • Strong project management skills with the ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive business impact.
  • Excellent communication, influencing, and negotiation skills.
  • Fluent in English, with additional languages as a plus.
  • Willingness to travel (~15% of the time)

Additional Information

What can Lesaffre offer you:

  • We are a successful family-owned company with long-standing history where people truly matter.
  • We promote a sense of fulfilment with a genuine mission: nourish and protect the planet.
  • You will experience intellectual challenges within a multi-expertise network.

At Lesaffre, diversity is a strength that enriches our culture and our teams. We are committed to offering you a work environment where you can thrive, regardless of your background, gender, age or abilities. We encourage all applications, as we believe that diverse perspectives strengthen our ability to innovate and meet the challenges of tomorrow.
json.descriptionText: As a global key player in yeasts and fermentation, Lesaffre designs, manufactures and markets innovative solutions for Baking, Food taste & pleasure, Health care and Biotechnology.Family group born in northern France in 1853, now a multi-national and a multicultural company, Lesaffre is committed to working with confidence to better nourish and protect the planet.In close collaboration with its clients and partners, Lesaffre employs 10 000 people in nearly 80 subsidiaries based in 50 countries.Lesaffre achieves a turnover of 2 billion euros.Job DescriptionAt Lesaffre, we believe in shaping the future of fermentation and biotechnology to improve food, health, and well-being worldwide. As a global leader in yeast and fermentation solutions, we are committed to fostering innovation and leveraging digital transformation to drive sustainable growth.Within this vision, the Open Innovation manager will play a pivotal role in driving external innovation, strategic partnerships, and digital adoption to accelerate Lesaffre’s impact across industries. This position requires working closely with internal stakeholders, research institutions, startups, and corporate partners to identify new opportunities, develop cutting-edge solutions, and strengthen Lesaffre’s position as an industry pioneer. Lead Open Innovation Strategy & Execution Develop and execute Lesaffre’s open innovation strategy, aligning it with DDTech & business objectives and priorities.  Identify and assess emerging technologies, business models, and innovation opportunities to serve DDTech team needs and Lesaffre’s core business and future growth.  Build and manage a structured innovation roadmap, supporting DDTech transformative initiatives or projects or /and exploratory business projects.  Establish and manage an open innovation governance framework, ensuring alignment with DDTech governance, corporate strategy and effective decision-making.  Promote a culture of innovation, fostering cross-functional collaboration to drive disruptive ideas.  Foster Strategic Partnerships & Ecosystem Engagement Establish strong collaborations with startups, incubators, venture capital firms, universities, and research institutions to bring innovative solutions to Lesaffre.  Lead Lesaffre’s participation in accelerators, industry consortiums, and open innovation networks to access breakthrough technologies.  Act as a key interface, together with relevant DDTech stakeholders, between Lesaffre and external innovation ecosystems to ensure seamless integration of new technologies and business models.  Negotiate and structure strategic partnerships, and co-development agreements with external partners.  Business Impact & Digital Adoption Work closely with Lesaffre’s DDTech Leadership teams, business units, R&D innovation teams, operations, marketing to ensure efforts are coordinated; aligned with needs and strategy Contribute, together with DDTech responsibles to drive the adoption of new digital solutions, leveraging AI, automation, data analytics, and biotechnology advancements to enhance efficiency and competitiveness.  Support the implementation of new business models and go-to-market strategies for innovative products and services.  Ensure the successful scaling and commercialization of innovation projects by engaging with key stakeholders and securing funding where needed.  Thought Leadership & Knowledge Sharing Act as an internal ambassador for innovation, promoting a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous learning within the organization.  Organize innovation workshops, hackathons, and training sessions to enhance internal capabilities.  Provide regular strategic insights on tech trends, market disruptions, and consumer behaviour shifts.  Develop internal reports and communication materials to share key innovation learnings across business units. Qualifications 7+ years of experience in innovation management, digital transformation, or working with startups/corporate innovation programs.  Strong entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for technology, sustainability, and industry disruption.  Proven ability to build and manage partnerships with external innovation ecosystems.  Strong project management skills with the ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive business impact.  Excellent communication, influencing, and negotiation skills.  Fluent in English, with additional languages as a plus.  Willingness to travel (~15% of the time)Additional InformationWhat can Lesaffre offer you:We are a successful family-owned company with long-standing history where people truly matter. We promote a sense of fulfilment with a genuine mission: nourish and protect the planet. You will experience intellectual challenges within a multi-expertise network. At Lesaffre, diversity is a strength that enriches our culture and our teams. We are committed to offering you a work environment where you can thrive, regardless of your background, gender, age or abilities. We encourage all applications, as we believe that diverse perspectives strengthen our ability to innovate and meet the challenges of tomorrow.
json.industries: IT Services and IT Consulting and Software Development
json.companySlogan:
Working together to better nourish
and protect the planet
json.companyDescription:
A key global player in fermentation for more than a century, Lesaffre, with a €3 billion turnover, and established on all continents, counts 11,000 employees and 96 nationalities.

On the strength of this experience and diversity, we work with customers, partners, and researchers to find ever more relevant answers to the needs of food,  health, naturalness and respect for our environment. Thus, every day, we explore and reveal the infinite potential of microorganisms.

To nourish 9 billion people, in a healthy way, in 2050 by making the most of our planet’s resources is a major and unprecedented issue. We believe that fermentation is one of the most promising answers to this challenge.

json.title: Head of Product Growth (Remote Europe)
json.descriptionHtml:
This position is posted by Jobgether on behalf of a partner company. We are currently looking for a Head of Product Growth in Europe.

As the Head of Product Growth, you will lead the development and execution of product-led growth strategies that drive self-serve revenue and activation at scale. You will own the growth engine, working across acquisition, activation, retention, and monetization levers to unlock sustainable expansion. Collaborating with cross-functional teams including product, engineering, sales, and marketing, you will define metrics, run experiments, and translate insights into actionable strategies. This role offers the opportunity to shape a high-velocity growth function, mentor a growing team, and directly influence how millions of users engage with a rapidly scaling AI-native workflow automation platform. You will operate in a remote-first European environment, driving both tactical execution and strategic vision to maximize product impact.

Accountabilities:

  • Define and execute the growth strategy for self-serve and product-led initiatives, including revenue forecasting, target setting, and MBR leadership
  • Identify, prioritize, and optimize growth levers across acquisition, activation, retention, and monetization to drive durable user engagement
  • Lead the design and implementation of experiments, ensuring reliable data capture, analysis, and actionable insights
  • Build and maintain robust growth dashboards to track critical events, funnel performance, and activation metrics
  • Operate as a player-coach, guiding a team of PMs and analysts while collaborating closely with engineering, product, and marketing to optimize user experience and conversion
  • Align product-led growth efforts with sales handoffs, defining PQL/PIQ metrics and ensuring smooth transitions between self-serve and enterprise channels
  • Hire, coach, and scale a high-performing growth team to support ongoing experimentation, lifecycle optimization, and data-driven decision-making


Requirements

  • 6-10+ years of experience in B2B SaaS product growth or PLG leadership, with demonstrated impact on activation, retention, and self-serve revenue
  • Proven commercial ownership, including forecasting, variance analysis, and the ability to clearly communicate growth drivers
  • Hands-on product growth experience, designing experiments and influencing pricing, packaging, and conversion strategies
  • Strong analytical and data modeling skills, with experience defining reliable instrumentation and designing trustworthy tests
  • Product sense with the ability to make foundational growth decisions, not just incremental tweaks
  • Experience as a player-coach, managing PMs or ICs, and executing cross-functional initiatives in self-serve and sales-led contexts

Nice-to-have: UX and copywriting intuition, dev-first experience, AI feature adoption exposure, and track record in scaling self-serve revenue significantly

Benefits

  • Competitive compensation and attractive equity ownership
  • Flexible, remote-first work across Europe, supporting work-life balance
  • Generous vacation policies and country-specific health, pension, and financial benefits
  • Personal development budget for courses, books, coaching, and skill enhancement
  • Participation in open-source initiatives with dedicated financial support
  • Access to AI tools to enhance productivity and creativity
  • Collaborative and ambitious culture with a high eNPS and frequent team hackathons
  • Transparent company communication and strategic alignment across all teams

Jobgether is a Talent Matching Platform that partners with companies worldwide to efficiently connect top talent with the right opportunities through AI-driven job matching. When you apply, your profile goes through our AI-powered screening process designed to identify top talent efficiently and fairly.

🔍 Our AI evaluates your CV and LinkedIn profile thoroughly, analyzing your skills, experience, and achievements.

📊 It compares your profile to the job's core requirements and past success factors to determine your match score.

🎯 Based on this analysis, we automatically shortlist the 3 candidates with the highest match to the role.

🧠 When necessary, our human team may perform an additional manual review to ensure no strong profile is missed.

The process is transparent, skills-based, and free of bias — focusing solely on your fit for the role. Once the shortlist is completed, we share it directly with the company that owns the job opening. The final decision and next steps (such as interviews or additional assessments) are then made by their internal hiring team.

Thank you for your interest!

json.industries: Primary and Secondary Education and Non-profit Organizations
json.companySlogan: The AI-driven global platform to hire and get hired, efficiently. The right talent. The right job. Instantly connected.
json.companyDescription:
Job search is broken. Talents waste hours applying blindly, companies drown in irrelevant CVs.
Jobgether flips the model.
We’re an AI-powered career coach and matching platform helping people land remote and flexible jobs faster.
Jobgether designs your job search strategy, prepares you to stand out, and connects you only with roles that truly match.
Finding a job isn’t about applying to hundreds of listings anymore, it’s about having the right strategy and visibility to attract the right opportunities.

Purpose & Vision
Our purpose is to make remote job search guided, fast, and effective, reducing frustration and wasted effort for both talents and employers.
We envision a world where careers are built with intention, not luck.
Where flexibility is the norm.
Where no talent remains invisible.

Jobgether exists to ensure that every professional has a real chance to find the right remote job.

json.title: AI QA Automation Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
Diabolocom enables organizations worldwide to build brand loyalty and drive sales growth.


Our innovative cloud-based solution leverages its proprietary AI technologies to optimize contact centers of medium to large sizes, enabling efficient management of customer interactions across all communication channels.


 As a telecom operator, we ensure premium voice quality, efficient handling of high call volumes, and provide phone numbers worldwide.


Our comprehensive range of AI services, specifically designed for customer relations, elevates data quality and automates tasks. These services, fully integrated into our cloud contact center solutions, are also accessible through APIs in multiple languages.


We empower Customer Service and Sales teams to effectively handle all inbound and outbound interactions thanks to our state-of-the-art dialer.


Our solution seamlessly integrates with leading CRMs and offers real-time monitoring and analytics capabilities.


Diabolocom, with offices across Europe, the USA, Brazil, and the UAE, proudly serves 350+ clients, with agents operating from 60+ countries.



About you:

Diabolocom is looking for a talented QA Automation Engineer to join its AI department. Join our team and play a key role in the development and maintenance of our AI products!


What We’re Looking For:

•At least 5 years of experience as a QA Engineer or SDET.

•Experience in testing AI models or machine learning applications would be a great advantage.


Technical Skills

- Build & maintain automation frameworks (PyTest, Typescript, Playwright, k6).

- Advanced experience with load/stress testing and measuring (statistical background is a plus)

- Experience with profiling of python (maybe C++) software and bottle-neck search

- Design test strategies for AI/ML products, APIs, pipelines, fuzzing.

- Create tests for LLM behavior (prompt injection, misuse, anomaly detection).

- Work with R&D team & AI Engineers on datasets, models & inference results.

- Nice to have: Strong linux background and familiarity with audio data formats and protocols

- Experience with estimation and measurement of SLA/SLO for a service


Soft Skills:

•Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.

•Excellent communication skills in spoken and written English.

•Ability to work collaboratively in a remote and multicultural environment.

•Ownership attitude with a proactive approach to quality assurance.


What’s in it for you:

- You’ll have the chance to work in a multicultural environment 

- You’ll have first choice IT equipment

- Flexible Work Environment:: full remote 

- Lunch vouchers: Swile card

- Team building events : Corsica, Marrakech, Djerba… what’s next? 

- Growth Opportunities: Join us at a pivotal stage of development with significant growth and paradigm shifts.

- Impactful Work: Play a key role in shaping the future of AI-driven customer experience and contact center solutions.

- Innovative Culture: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies and proprietary models designed for customer relations.


Recruitment process 

1. Home technical challenge

2. Introductory call with a Talent Acquisition Manager (30-45 minutes)

3. Technical Interview with the Head of AI Technology, Tom and QA Tech Lead, Andy ( 45 minutes)

4. Team fit interview with our Head of AI Product, Rémi (60 minutes)

5. Job offer meeting with the Head of AI Production, Bastien ( 20 minutes)



At Diabolocom, diversity and inclusion are in our DNA. All qualified applicants will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to color, language, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national or social origin, opinion disability, age.

json.companySlogan: AI-Powered Cloud Contact Center Software
json.companyDescription:
For over 20 years, Diabolocom has been transforming how businesses engage with customers. Our cloud-based Contact Center as a Service (CCaaS) solution, powered by proprietary generative AI, delivers exactly what today’s customer service and sales teams need—intelligent automation, enhanced reachability, and actionable insights. 

From real-time call transcription to satisfaction analysis and next-best-action guidance, our AI Assistant seamlessly integrates into every customer interaction, driving faster resolutions. What sets Diabolocom apart is our native AI for CX combined with full telecom services, creating a unique solution for hyper-customized customer interactions and telephony management. By automating the mundane, your teams can focus on what matters: winning customer loyalty and driving growth. 

We seamlessly integrate with leading CRMs like Salesforce, Oracle, and Microsoft, giving your teams complete visibility into every conversation and enabling you to accelerate business growth. 

That’s why industry leaders like Mitsubishi Electric, Nikon, Mantrac Group, and Brinks trust Diabolocom to deliver exceptional customer experiences that set them apart. Our AI-driven platform reduces post-call processing by 97% and slashes churn by 12%. The result? More satisfied customers and a more proactive, agile team. 

Ready to challenge the norm? Join global brands transforming customer relationships in over 60 countries with Diabolocom.

Learn more about Diabolocom: https://www.diabolocom.com/

json.title: Freelance AI/ML Penetration Tester
json.descriptionHtml:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. Please submit your resume in English and indicate your level of English proficiency.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Coding, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Evaluate and red team AI models and agents and machine learning systems for vulnerabilities and safety risks.
  • Create offline reproducible & auto-evaluable test cases to test safety & capability of AI agents.
  • Develop and implement automation scripts, custom tools, environments and test harnesses.
  • Lead or contribute to security research initiatives, especially in AI safety, creating and implementing realistic and challenging attack scenarios for the model.
  • Advise on cybersecurity best practices and policy implications

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Cybersecurity, Digital Forensics or other related fields.
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • Proficient in scripting and automation using Python, Bash, or PowerShell
  • Experienced with containerization and CI/CD security tools, especially Docker.
  • Hands-on experience with penetration testing across web, API, network, and infrastructure environments.
  • Knowledge of vulnerabilities in current AI models, including prompt injections, with knowledge of OWASP Top 10 for Large Language Models (LLMs)
  • Familiar with AI red-teaming frameworks such as garak or PyRIT.
  • Experience in AI/ML security, evaluation, and red teaming, particularly with LLMs, AI agents, and RAG pipelines.
  • Proficient in offensive exploitation and exploit development
  • Skilled in reverse engineering using tools like Ghidra or equivalents.
  • Expertise in network and application security, including web application security.
  • Knowledge of operating system security concepts such as Linux privilege escalation and Windows internals.
  • Familiar with secure coding practices for full-stack development.
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $47/hour depending on your skills, experience, and project needs
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companySlogan: Be the “I” in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects
json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift — a space where innovation meets opportunity. We’re a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks — ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let’s build the future of AI together, one task at a time.
