json.companySlogan: Our Technology.  Your Innovation.
json.companyDescription:
Synopsys is the leader in engineering solutions from silicon to systems, enabling customers to rapidly innovate AI-powered products. We deliver industry-leading silicon design, IP, simulation and analysis solutions, and design services.  

We partner closely with our customers across a wide range of industries to maximize their R&D capability and productivity, powering innovation today that ignites the ingenuity of tomorrow.

json.title: Head of Product Operations
json.descriptionHtml:
As a Head of Product Operations at WeeFin, you will serve as a central enabler for the entire product organisation, ensuring that processes, tools, and collaboration frameworks allow our product teams to deliver efficiently, consistently, and at scale.

You will be responsible for cross-product coordination, lifecycle governance, and process optimisation, helping Product Managers, Product Owners, and other stakeholders operate at their best. You will own the product tool stack (e.g., Notion, AHA!, product analytics platforms) and ensure processes are well-defined, documented, and continuously improved.

This role is highly cross-functional, working with Product, Tech, QA, UX, Marketing, Sales, and Operations to streamline workflows, reduce inefficiencies, and strengthen alignment. As WeeFin moves into an AI-driven product era, you will also explore and coordinate AI-powered efficiencies in workflows, reporting, and documentation. With your prior product management experience you are a mentor to the team.

Your success will be measured by efficiency gains, documentation quality, team alignment, and satisfaction with processes across the product organisation.

Key Responsibilities

Cross-Product Coordination & Alignment

  • Facilitate alignment across product managers, owners, and squads to ensure a consistent approach to roadmap execution.
  • Support structured communication between product and other functions (Tech, Marketing, Sales, Ops).
  • Track dependencies and ensure smooth handovers across product lifecycle stages (Innovation → Scale → Operations).

Process & Lifecycle Management

  • Define, document, and continuously improve core product processes (discovery, prioritisation, delivery, release, iteration).
  • Ensure consistent application of lifecycle frameworks, scoring models, and success measurement.
  • Monitor process adoption and proactively identify gaps or bottlenecks.

Tooling Ownership & Enablement

  • Own the product organisation’s tooling stack (e.g., Notion, AHA!, analytics platforms).
  • Standardise tool usage, workflows, and templates to maximise efficiency and minimise duplication.
  • Evaluate and implement new tools or integrations to enhance collaboration and reporting.

Efficiency & Quality Tracking

  • Define and monitor KPIs for process efficiency, delivery velocity, and quality.
  • Support Product Ops leadership in reporting on product organisation health and impact.
  • Identify opportunities for automation and efficiency gains, including AI-enabled workflows.

AI-Driven Product Ops

  • Explore AI-driven solutions for documentation, reporting, and workflow automation.
  • Coordinate adoption of AI assistants for backlog refinement, meeting summaries, and data analysis.
  • Ensure processes incorporate responsible AI practices (bias checks, transparency, auditability).

Collaboration, Communication & Mentorship

  • Act as the central point of contact for process and tooling questions within the product team.
  • Facilitate workshops, retrospectives, and enablement sessions to build a culture of operational excellence.
  • Partner with Product Managers and Owners to ensure product operations directly support strategic and delivery objectives.
  • Be a mentor for the product team across Product and GTM practices.

Technical & Functional Skills

  • Proven experience with product tool ownership (e.g., AHA!, Jira or DevOps, Confluence, analytics tools, Notion,...).
  • Strong product lifecycle management skills.
  • Familiarity with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe) and product lifecycle frameworks.
  • Data-driven mindset; comfortable defining and tracking KPIs for efficiency, adoption, and quality.

AI-related Competencies

  • Familiarity with AI workflow automation tools (e.g., Zapier, AI copilots in Jira/Notion).
  • Understanding how LLMs can support documentation, reporting, and knowledge management.
  • Ability to evaluate and integrate AI-powered tools into team workflows responsibly.

Behavioral Competencies

  • Structured, detail-oriented, and highly organised.
  • Excellent facilitation and communication skills.
  • Strong problem-solving abilities and proactive mindset.
  • Highly collaborative; able to interface effectively with diverse teams.
  • Passion for enabling others to succeed.

Required Qualifications

  • 15 years’ experience in Product Management for SaaS.
  • Background in product proposition building.
  • Proven track record of improving processes and driving efficiency across teams.
  • Proven experience in delivering products with full GTM strategy and multi stakeholder alignment.
  • Experience managing and optimising product stacks.
  • Strong communication skills in English (written and spoken).
  • Familiarity with AI-enabled tooling and process automation is a plus.

It is possible to work at the London or Paris office (one of the two, but not both).

json.companySlogan: The SaaS platform that empowers financial institutions to scale their sustainability strategy and drives real impact
json.companyDescription:
🌱 WeeFin is revolutionizing sustainable finance. Our SaaS platform empowers financial institutions to build and scale high-impact sustainability strategies—faster, smarter, and with confidence. By unifying ESG data into a single source of truth and enabling seamless collaboration across teams, we help our clients turn regulatory pressure into strategic advantage.

🚀 Since launching oft he platform in 2021, WeeFin has earned the trust of over 40 clients managing nearly €7,000 billion in assets. Backed by an international team based in Paris and London, we’re active in 10 countries and growing fast. In 2025, we raised a €25 million Series B to accelerate our growth, expand our product offering, and scale our impact across global markets.

🥇 Recognized as Best Technological Innovation for ESG (Agefi), Member of the Impact 120 Index (Mouvement Impact France), and awarded Best Data Management Initiative for ESG (Data Management Insight A-team)

json.title: IA Product Manager
json.descriptionHtml:
Our mission at PlayPlay?

To empower every company to achieve tangible business results with a video creation platform that is powerful, intuitive, and accessible.

Our ambition?

To become the leading international video solution, with sustainable and profitable growth.

At PlayPlay, innovation is at the heart of everything we do—AI, automation, and new features rolled out continuously. We are transforming video creation so that every team, regardless of technical skill, can produce impactful content.

Joining PlayPlay Means

  • Putting the power of video into everyone’s hands, so that every company can turn video creation into a true business driver.
  • Growing within a culture that combines excellence, genuine care for others, and responsible transparency.
  • Thriving in an international, passionate, and supportive team where every idea is heard, challenged, and can help reshape the way we work.
  • Finding your place in an inclusive and committed work environment, where what makes each of us unique drives the whole team forward.
  • Demonstrating resilience and strong determination, because things don’t always go as planned. And that’s precisely where our culture makes the difference: it’s what makes the PlayPlay journey so exciting, rich in learning, and pushes us to give our best.

And what makes us stay?

That feeling of belonging to a team that goes above and beyond for the PlayPlay project—without ever losing sight of the people who make it happen.

As a product manager, you’ll join the PlayPlay product team composed PM, Product Designer and Motion Designers to define, craft, and ship a world-class product. As a product manager, you’ll work on the full product cycle from discovery to delivery and launch activities. Generative AI is not just a buzzword here; it is the engine behind our product strategy.

We leverage best-in-class Gen-AI technologies to solve complex user problems. Our approach is twofold: we constantly improve our main product with powerful AI features, and we create and launch new AI-first products that grow our offering. We are looking for a Product Manager who follows the latest releases in the Gen-AI world and knows how to use these technologies to build amazing user experiences within this fast-paced environment.

Missions 💪

  • 🎯 Roadmap & Vision
  • Continuously gather stakeholder insights to shape and prioritize the product roadmap.
  • Own and evolve your product vision on a semesterly basis.
  • 🔍 Discovery & Market Insights
  • Stay on top of AI trends and the competitive landscape.
  • Deeply understand user pain points and motivations through qualitative research.
  • Assess AI model quality, configuration options, and pricing models.
  • Define and track the right KPIs to measure product impact.
  • 🚀 Execution & Delivery
  • Collaborate with design and engineering to build the best solutions for users.
  • Lead delivery preparation: story mapping, backlog management, specs, etc.
  • Act as the prompt engineer for your features — design, test, and optimize prompts to ensure top-quality outputs.
  • Guarantee high product quality through testing and bug-free releases.
  • Partner with marketing to deliver PMM activities on product launches.
  • Analyze feature performance, generate insights, and decide whether to iterate or sunset.
  • 🌟 Product Culture & Evangelism
  • Communicate the “why” behind every initiative to align and inspire teams.
  • Share expertise within the Product team, especially on prompt engineering.
  • Continuously improve product processes, workflows, and tools.
  • Support CS and Sales in customer meetings and webinars.
  • Represent PlayPlay in the product community—speak, share, and engage externally.

Requirements 🎯

  • 3+ years of experience as a Product Manager, ideally on SaaS products on a full term contract
  • Proven track record delivering AI-powered features — you’ve owned the prompt engineering process end-to-end and integrated AI into your daily PM routines.
  • Exceptional communication skills (including English): you inspire teams, engage stakeholders, and bring energy, fun, and creativity to every project. You’re confident presenting your work to the whole company.
  • Entrepreneurial mindset: you love experimenting with new AI models, prototyping ideas with Figma-make or vibe-code, and thriving in fast-moving, uncertain environments.
  • Structured and driven: you balance creativity with strong execution and follow-through.
  • User empathy at heart: you deeply care about creating meaningful, delightful user experiences.

About You ❤️

  • Full of empathy for users
  • Eager to be part of a fun, fast-paced environment
  • A self-starter who’s solution-oriented, strategic, passionate and thoughtful about their work
  • Organized and ambitious mindset to follow the development of the team
  • Product thinker, strong user advocate

OUR VALUES

Creative: We don't do things the same way as others and we like that. It's that madness that gives everyone the freedom to innovate and follow through with their ideas.

User-first: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do because a product is nothing without its users and it is with its users that a product grows.

United: What motivates us is to succeed together. We are specialists in cross-team projects: it is by sharing our expertise and supporting each other that we achieve our goals.

Ambitious: We are not afraid to move fast and take risks. If plan A doesn't work, there are still all the letters in the alphabet. We learn from our experiences and adapt.

Committed: We take ownership of our projects, with responsibility. We are demanding of others but above all, we give our best.

DIVERSITY & INCLUSION

At PlayPlay, we're committed to fostering an environment where diversity and inclusion are at the heart of our values. Our goal is to attract and build a diverse, equal and inclusive team, where everyone feels welcome.

As an equal opportunities employer we make sure the application process and our workplace is for everyone.

We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

json.companySlogan: PlayPlay is the video platform for teams to effortlessly create branded videos that drive real business results
json.companyDescription:
PlayPlay empowers your whole business to easily create videos that get noticed and drive action.

Built for businesses, this intuitive platform comes with enterprise-ready and AI-powered workflows, so that any team can autonomously create on-brand videos in minutes—without requiring any editing skills. 

Trusted by over 3,000 companies for product launches, executive announcements, employee updates, and more.

json.title: Freelance - IA Product Manager
json.descriptionHtml:
Our mission at PlayPlay?

To empower every company to achieve tangible business results with a video creation platform that is powerful, intuitive, and accessible.

Our ambition?

To become the leading international video solution, with sustainable and profitable growth.

At PlayPlay, innovation is at the heart of everything we do—AI, automation, and new features rolled out continuously. We are transforming video creation so that every team, regardless of technical skill, can produce impactful content.

Joining PlayPlay Means

  • Putting the power of video into everyone’s hands, so that every company can turn video creation into a true business driver.
  • Growing within a culture that combines excellence, genuine care for others, and responsible transparency.
  • Thriving in an international, passionate, and supportive team where every idea is heard, challenged, and can help reshape the way we work.
  • Finding your place in an inclusive and committed work environment, where what makes each of us unique drives the whole team forward.
  • Demonstrating resilience and strong determination, because things don’t always go as planned. And that’s precisely where our culture makes the difference: it’s what makes the PlayPlay journey so exciting, rich in learning, and pushes us to give our best.

And what makes us stay?

That feeling of belonging to a team that goes above and beyond for the PlayPlay project—without ever losing sight of the people who make it happen.

As a product manager, you’ll join the PlayPlay product team composed PM, Product Designer and Motion Designers to define, craft, and ship a world-class product. As a product manager, you’ll work on the full product cycle from discovery to delivery and launch activities. Generative AI is not just a buzzword here; it is the engine behind our product strategy.

We leverage best-in-class Gen-AI technologies to solve complex user problems. Our approach is twofold: we constantly improve our main product with powerful AI features, and we create and launch new AI-first products that grow our offering. We are looking for a Product Manager who follows the latest releases in the Gen-AI world and knows how to use these technologies to build amazing user experiences within this fast-paced environment.

Missions 💪

  • 🎯 Roadmap & Vision
  • Continuously gather stakeholder insights to shape and prioritize the product roadmap.
  • Own and evolve your product vision on a semesterly basis.
  • 🔍 Discovery & Market Insights
  • Stay on top of AI trends and the competitive landscape.
  • Deeply understand user pain points and motivations through qualitative research.
  • Assess AI model quality, configuration options, and pricing models.
  • Define and track the right KPIs to measure product impact.
  • 🚀 Execution & Delivery
  • Collaborate with design and engineering to build the best solutions for users.
  • Lead delivery preparation: story mapping, backlog management, specs, etc.
  • Act as the prompt engineer for your features — design, test, and optimize prompts to ensure top-quality outputs.
  • Guarantee high product quality through testing and bug-free releases.
  • Partner with marketing to deliver PMM activities on product launches.
  • Analyze feature performance, generate insights, and decide whether to iterate or sunset.
  • 🌟 Product Culture & Evangelism
  • Communicate the “why” behind every initiative to align and inspire teams.
  • Share expertise within the Product team, especially on prompt engineering.
  • Continuously improve product processes, workflows, and tools.
  • Support CS and Sales in customer meetings and webinars.
  • Represent PlayPlay in the product community—speak, share, and engage externally.

Requirements 🎯

  • 3+ years of experience as a Product Manager, ideally on SaaS products on a full term contract
  • Proven track record delivering AI-powered features — you’ve owned the prompt engineering process end-to-end and integrated AI into your daily PM routines.
  • Exceptional communication skills (including English): you inspire teams, engage stakeholders, and bring energy, fun, and creativity to every project. You’re confident presenting your work to the whole company.
  • Entrepreneurial mindset: you love experimenting with new AI models, prototyping ideas with Figma-make or vibe-code, and thriving in fast-moving, uncertain environments.
  • Structured and driven: you balance creativity with strong execution and follow-through.
  • User empathy at heart: you deeply care about creating meaningful, delightful user experiences.

About You ❤️

  • Full of empathy for users
  • Eager to be part of a fun, fast-paced environment
  • A self-starter who’s solution-oriented, strategic, passionate and thoughtful about their work
  • Organized and ambitious mindset to follow the development of the team
  • Product thinker, strong user advocate

OUR VALUES

Creative: We don't do things the same way as others and we like that. It's that madness that gives everyone the freedom to innovate and follow through with their ideas.

User-first: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do because a product is nothing without its users and it is with its users that a product grows.

United: What motivates us is to succeed together. We are specialists in cross-team projects: it is by sharing our expertise and supporting each other that we achieve our goals.

Ambitious: We are not afraid to move fast and take risks. If plan A doesn't work, there are still all the letters in the alphabet. We learn from our experiences and adapt.

Committed: We take ownership of our projects, with responsibility. We are demanding of others but above all, we give our best.

DIVERSITY & INCLUSION

At PlayPlay, we're committed to fostering an environment where diversity and inclusion are at the heart of our values. Our goal is to attract and build a diverse, equal and inclusive team, where everyone feels welcome.

As an equal opportunities employer we make sure the application process and our workplace is for everyone.

We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

json.title: GTM RevOps & AI Automation Lead
json.descriptionHtml:
Location: France or Europe

Team: Marketing

Contract : Permanent (CDI

Start: January 2026

Salary : depending on profile and work location + benefits


Perks & Benefits : https://jobs.bonitasoft.com/posts/bonitasoft-benefits


We’re evolving from a BPM-first software company to an AI-powered orchestration platform.

Your mission: build the GTM engine that powers this shift i.e. unify data, standardize processes, and deploy AI agents to eliminate manual work across Marketing and Sales.


This role sits at the crossroads of Revenue Operations, AI, and automation, ideal for someone who understands the evolving landscape of AI-driven business transformation and is eager to leverage next-gen tools (LLMs, prompt-based workflows, deep search, AI copilots) to redefine operational excellence.


What’s in it for you ?

This is a rare opportunity to architect an entire GTM system from scratch, at the intersection of AI, automation, and revenue.

You won’t just integrate tools. You’ll design architecture, ship systems, and deploy real AI agents that remove friction and accelerate decisions.

We offer autonomy, ownership, and context, so you can build systems that actually scale.


Key responsibilities

  • Architect the GTM operating model : Define how Marketing, Sales, and Partners work together.
  • Own and evolve HubSpot : Turn our CRM HubSpot into the operating system for revenue.
  • Connect the stack : Break silos by linking product data, campaign performance, CRM flows, and partner systems. Collaborate with IT, our Architect, and the GTM teams to make the system reflect reality.
  • Build dashboards that drive decisions
  • Model and govern clean data : You’ll build confidence in the data that drives conversion and spend.
  • Deploy smart automations & AI agents : You’ll choose where AI delivers the most leverage and ensure it’s safe, auditable, and useful.
  • Enable the team : Make your systems usable.
  • Build with compliance in mind : GDPR, privacy by design, human-in-the-loop, you’ll ensure trust and safety from day one.


Tooling you'll likely use

HubSpot, Make / n8n, SQL, Looker Studio, Clay, Instantly, Git, OpenAI / Mistral, Notion, Enrichment & intent tools.


What sets you apart

  • Senior/Lead in RevOps or Marketing Ops in SaaS or enterprise software
  • Deep experience owning and scaling HubSpot within a modern GTM system for revenue growth (content engine, outbound workflows, ABM enablement, inbound orchestration…)
  • Strong data skills: SQL, funnel KPIs, reporting, schema design
  • Hands-on automation with Make, n8n, or similar
  • LLMs in production, you’ve shipped agents that work
  • Prompt design & debugging skills
  • Systems thinker: you ship, document, and iterate
  • Comfortable with GDPR, data governance, and AI safety
  • French & English


Hiring process

  1. Introduction with our Talent Acquisition
  2. Take-home assignment & Live Role play
  3. Feedback interview + deep dive into the role and expectations
  4. Wrap-up interview with our VP of People


Follow the apply button for the detailed job description.

json.companySlogan:
Digital Business Automation with the leading BPM-based, Open Source Bonita Platform
(and also a Great Place to Work®!)
json.companyDescription:
Bonitasoft fully supports digital operations and IT modernization with Bonita, an open-source and extensible platform for automation and optimization of business processes. 

The Bonita platform accelerates development and production with clear separation between capabilities for visual programming and for coding. Bonita integrates with existing information systems, orchestrates heterogeneous systems, and provides deep visibility into processes across the organization.

For Q&A and discussions about the Bonita platform visit our Community at https://community.bonitasoft.com/

You can also contact us at <your secret>. 
Follow us on Twitter, Facebook or Instagram!

json.title: Head of Digital & Industrial Innovation
json.descriptionHtml:
Job Description

Head of Digital & Industrial Innovation

Posting Start Date: 10/30/25

Industrial Operations

France

Nexans HQ - Courbevoie

Full Time

Experienced - over 5 years

ID: 78892

The company has initiated a major strategic orientation towards innovation to support its growth in value rather than in volume.

Digital business transformation is a journey to adopt and deploy digital technologies and business models to improve performance quantifiably. The first step is to grasp the need for change—an imperative driven by the inevitability of digital disruption. Digital disruption now has the potential to overturn incumbents and reshape markets faster than perhaps any force in history. Simply put, digital disruption is the effect of digital technologies and business models on a company’s current value proposition, and its resulting market position.

The portfolio rationalization is initializing to focus and invest only on profitable customers, and it relies on our capability to provide tailored Services solutions which shall create strong differentiation versus competition and increase Nexans’ competitive advantage

Nexans has already launch key partnership in the digital area in order to amplify its transformation.

    • Nexans partners with Schneider Electric on digital transformation program to bring industrial 4.0 to plant operations and amplify sustainability. The aim is to accelerate the transformation of Nexans into a business driven by clear, rich and actionable data as the foundation for improved business performance, safety and flexibility.
    • Nexans announced a collaboration with Microsoft to electrify the future by accelerating the development of digital solutions , developing enhanced artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud solutions as the foundation for digital services and solutions that will drive the global energy transition.
    • Nexans, in partnership with start-up Cosmo Tech, is offering a new network asset management service, using the “digital twin” concept.
For the past five years, a Group-wide digitalization program has been rolled out across approximately 50 manufacturing sites. This program has established solid foundations in areas such as MES, IoT, and data analytics. The Group is now entering a new phase, focused on consolidating existing gains, ensuring continuity, and defining the next frontier of its industrial transformation. Key new challenges include integrating artificial intelligence into core processes and initiating a strategic vision for plant robotics. This role is central to structuring and driving these innovation tracks in a scalable, sustainable, and business-aligned way.

The Head of Digital & Industrial Innovation will serve as the visionary leader and catalyst for advancing the organization’s capabilities, driving the transformation of traditional industrial operations into a data-driven and ensuring the right continuity of the execution of the Digital roadmap. – at the service of industrial standardization and performance.

In addition, as the organization is at the early stages of AI adoption, the Head of Digital & Industrial Innovation will lead the development of AI-based solutions in our operations, build internal talent and expertise, and foster a culture of innovation and change. They will bridge the gap between industrial domain knowledge and emerging AI technologies to unlock value through improved efficiency, predictive maintenance, quality control, and automation – in closed coordination with Digital & AI group Director.

Areas Of Responsabilities

Ensure continuity and evolution of the digital Industrial Transformation program for the plants :

  • Secure and steer the progress of the current digital initiatives across all plants.
  • Assess digital maturity levels and identify areas for reinforcement or scaling.
  • Ensure the animation of the Digital Leads network across the world. Deep adoption of the tools by the blue collar worker is a must.
  • Define the next phase of the digital roadmap aligned with industrial strategy and standardization objectives
  • Support the plant leaders to ensure adoption and value creation from digital tools (debottlenecking, capacity management, S&OP process, industrial performance, safety, etc.)

Integrate AI Into Industrial Processes

  • Identify high-impact use cases for AI in manufacturing (customer service, differentiation, lead time, predictive maintenance, process optimization, quality control, energy efficiency, industrial performance, S&OP and load balance, standardization...).
  • Drive collaboration between industrial, data science, and IT teams.
  • Supervise pilots and ensure industrialization of validated AI solutions.
  • Promote data-driven decision-making culture within operational teams.

Drive Strategic Thinking And Pilots Around Plant Robotics

  • Map current levels of automation and robotics across the Group.
  • Benchmark technologies and assess feasibility of robotics expansion (robotization, cobots, AGVs, etc.).
  • Develop a mid/long-term robotics vision aligned with business and workforce evolution.
  • Identify pilot projects with potential for scale-up.

Team Leadership & Talent Development

  • Identify capability gaps and proactively bring in new talent or expertise to support strategic goals ; including hiring, contracting, or partnering with external specialists as needed.
  • Create an environment that supports continuous learning, knowledge sharing, and experimentation.

Business Impact & Performance Measurement

  • Track the performance on cash generation, safety and quality of all initiatives.
  • Report regularly to executive leadership on strategy progress, project outcomes, and capability maturity.
  • Use insights and feedback to continuously improve AI solutions and processes.

Candidate Profile

  • Education: Degree in engineering (general, automation, industrial IT, or equivalent). - Additional training in digital transformation or AI is a plus.
  • Experience: Minimum 8–10 years of experience in a multi-site industrial environment. - Strong track record in leading digital or innovation programs. - Knowledge of industrial AI applications and robotics preferred. Experience in Operations management is a must.
  • Key Competencies: Proven leadership in matrixed, cross-functional environments. - Results-driven with the ability to turn innovation into business value and cash generation. - Strong project management and communication skills, with ability to evolve between strategy and hands-on problem solving. - Strategic thinking, technological curiosity, and pragmatism.
  • Languages: Fluent in English (mandatory). - Other languages (Spanish, Portuguese) are a plus depending on plant locations.

Why Join This Mission? Shape the next chapter of a successful industrial digitalization journey. - Be a key driver of innovation with tangible operational impact. - Work in a dynamic, multicultural environment at the intersection of industry and technology

companyAddress.streetAddress: 中国上海市静安区恒丰路436号环智国际大厦

json.companySlogan: 耐克森为生活注入活力
json.companyDescription:
耐克森与中国的渊源可以追溯到二十世纪八十年代。作为继承百年历史的世界领先的线缆及系统制造商，耐克森致力于对中国的经济发展做出贡献。几十年来，耐克森不断为中国的客户提供先进的技术、高质量的产品和可靠的服务。

耐克森的产品及服务广泛地应用于中国的各种工业领域、公共设施以及与人类生活息息相关的每一处，例如造船工业及海洋工程（船用电缆），铁路及地铁（机车车辆电缆），核电站（核电电缆），航天航空（高温导线及通讯），物料搬运（港机电缆），工业自动化（工业自动化电缆），电力网络建设（高压电、海缆及中、高压附件），以及建筑楼宇（综合布线系统）。

随着中国市场的战略地位越来越受到重视，耐克森也在不断增加在华投资，继续开拓中国业务并加强产品的本地化生产进程。2001年，耐克森大中华区总部在上海成立，全面管理耐克森在华的相关业务。目前，耐克森在中国拥有四家独资公司和一家合资公司，在上海、北京、成都、广州、深圳和香港均设有办事处。

json.title: Head of Digital & Industrial Innovation
json.descriptionHtml:
The company has initiated a major strategic orientation towards innovation to support its growth in value rather than in volume.

Digital business transformation is a journey to adopt and deploy digital technologies and business models to improve performance quantifiably. The first step is to grasp the need for change—an imperative driven by the inevitability of digital disruption. Digital disruption now has the potential to overturn incumbents and reshape markets faster than perhaps any force in history. Simply put, digital disruption is the effect of digital technologies and business models on a company’s current value proposition, and its resulting market position.

The portfolio rationalization is initializing to focus and invest only on profitable customers, and it relies on our capability to provide tailored Services solutions which shall create strong differentiation versus competition and increase Nexans’ competitive advantage

Nexans has already launch key partnership in the digital area in order to amplify its transformation.

    • Nexans partners with Schneider Electric on digital transformation program to bring industrial 4.0 to plant operations and amplify sustainability. The aim is to accelerate the transformation of Nexans into a business driven by clear, rich and actionable data as the foundation for improved business performance, safety and flexibility.
    • Nexans announced a collaboration with Microsoft to electrify the future by accelerating the development of digital solutions , developing enhanced artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud solutions as the foundation for digital services and solutions that will drive the global energy transition.
    • Nexans, in partnership with start-up Cosmo Tech, is offering a new network asset management service, using the “digital twin” concept.


For the past five years, a Group-wide digitalization program has been rolled out across approximately 50 manufacturing sites. This program has established solid foundations in areas such as MES, IoT, and data analytics. The Group is now entering a new phase, focused on consolidating existing gains, ensuring continuity, and defining the next frontier of its industrial transformation. Key new challenges include integrating artificial intelligence into core processes and initiating a strategic vision for plant robotics. This role is central to structuring and driving these innovation tracks in a scalable, sustainable, and business-aligned way.

The Head of Digital & Industrial Innovation will serve as the visionary leader and catalyst for advancing the organization’s capabilities, driving the transformation of traditional industrial operations into a data-driven and ensuring the right continuity of the execution of the Digital roadmap. – at the service of industrial standardization and performance.

In addition, as the organization is at the early stages of AI adoption, the Head of Digital & Industrial Innovation will lead the development of AI-based solutions in our operations, build internal talent and expertise, and foster a culture of innovation and change. They will bridge the gap between industrial domain knowledge and emerging AI technologies to unlock value through improved efficiency, predictive maintenance, quality control, and automation – in closed coordination with Digital & AI group Director.

Areas of responsabilities :

Ensure continuity and evolution of the digital Industrial Transformation program for the plants :

  • Secure and steer the progress of the current digital initiatives across all plants.
  • Assess digital maturity levels and identify areas for reinforcement or scaling.
  • Ensure the animation of the Digital Leads network across the world. Deep adoption of the tools by the blue collar worker is a must.
  • Define the next phase of the digital roadmap aligned with industrial strategy and standardization objectives
  • Support the plant leaders to ensure adoption and value creation from digital tools (debottlenecking, capacity management, S&OP process, industrial performance, safety, etc.)


Integrate AI into industrial processes :

  • Identify high-impact use cases for AI in manufacturing (customer service, differentiation, lead time, predictive maintenance, process optimization, quality control, energy efficiency, industrial performance, S&OP and load balance, standardization...).
  • Drive collaboration between industrial, data science, and IT teams.
  • Supervise pilots and ensure industrialization of validated AI solutions.
  • Promote data-driven decision-making culture within operational teams.


Drive strategic thinking and pilots around plant robotics :

  • Map current levels of automation and robotics across the Group.
  • Benchmark technologies and assess feasibility of robotics expansion (robotization, cobots, AGVs, etc.).
  • Develop a mid/long-term robotics vision aligned with business and workforce evolution.
  • Identify pilot projects with potential for scale-up.


Team Leadership & Talent Development :

  • Identify capability gaps and proactively bring in new talent or expertise to support strategic goals ; including hiring, contracting, or partnering with external specialists as needed.
  • Create an environment that supports continuous learning, knowledge sharing, and experimentation.


Business impact & Performance measurement :

  • Track the performance on cash generation, safety and quality of all initiatives.
  • Report regularly to executive leadership on strategy progress, project outcomes, and capability maturity.
  • Use insights and feedback to continuously improve AI solutions and processes.


Candidate profile :

  • Education: Degree in engineering (general, automation, industrial IT, or equivalent). - Additional training in digital transformation or AI is a plus.
  • Experience: Minimum 8–10 years of experience in a multi-site industrial environment. - Strong track record in leading digital or innovation programs. - Knowledge of industrial AI applications and robotics preferred. Experience in Operations management is a must.
  • Key Competencies: Proven leadership in matrixed, cross-functional environments. - Results-driven with the ability to turn innovation into business value and cash generation. - Strong project management and communication skills, with ability to evolve between strategy and hands-on problem solving. - Strategic thinking, technological curiosity, and pragmatism.
  • Languages: Fluent in English (mandatory). - Other languages (Spanish, Portuguese) are a plus depending on plant locations.


Why Join This Mission? Shape the next chapter of a successful industrial digitalization journey. - Be a key driver of innovation with tangible operational impact. - Work in a dynamic, multicultural environment at the intersection of industry and technology

json.jobPosterTitle: Talent Acquisition & Internal Mobility Specialist - Nexans
json.companySlogan: Electrify the Future.
json.companyDescription: For over a century, Nexans has played a crucial role in the electrification of the planet and is committed to electrifying the future. With approximately 28,500 people in 41 countries, the Group is paving the way to a new world of safe, sustainable and decarbonized electricity that is accessible to everyone. In 2024, Nexans generated €7.1 billion in standard sales. The Group is a leader in the design and manufacturing of cable systems and services across four main business areas: PWR-Transmission, PWR-Grid, PWR-Connect and Industry & Solutions. Nexans was the first company in its industry to create a Foundation supporting sustainable initiatives, bringing access to energy to disadvantaged communities worldwide. The Group is recognized as a global leader on climate action and has committed to Net-Zero emissions by 2050 aligned with the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi).

json.title: Automation Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
About Us

At Harmattan AI, we are a next-generation defense prime building autonomous and scalable defense systems. Driven by rigorous engineering developments of new defense products based on recent robotics and AI developments, we are on a steep growth trajectory. If you are interested in a career in a highly technical environment, thrive on pushing boundaries, and want to achieve ambitious goals, we would love to hear from you.

About The Role

We are looking for a skilled and forward-thinking Automation Engineer to design, implement, and optimize automation systems at our production site, the model for our future global manufacturing sites.

You’ll lead automation projects that enable cost-effective, high-volume, and defense-grade production through robotics, digital integration, and lean processes.

Responsibilities

Automation Systems

  • Design and deploy automated solutions across key manufacturing and test processes.
  • Translate manual tasks into robust automated stations (robotics, sensors, actuators, software).
  • Own equipment specifications, commissioning, and validation with suppliers and integrators.

Performance & Reliability

  • Maximize OEE through improved uptime, performance, and first-pass yield.
  • Analyze real-time data and fault logs to drive continuous improvement.
  • Support maintenance and production teams in troubleshooting and system optimization.

Digital Integration

  • Connect automation platforms to ERP/MES for live traceability and performance data.
  • Build OEE dashboards and enable predictive maintenance through data and IoT tools.
  • Contribute to digital twin and simulation projects for capacity and layout planning.

Innovation & Standardization

  • Evaluate and prototype new automation and robotics technologies.
  • Standardize automation architectures and documentation for replication in future factories.
  • Train technical staff and provide user-friendly system documentation.

Candidate Requirements

  • Degree in Automation Engineering, Mechatronics, Robotics, or equivalent.
  • 5+ years experience in manufacturing automation (design, commissioning, optimization).
  • Strong command of robotics, PLCs, sensors, motion systems, and automation safety standards (CE).
  • Interest in Industry 4.0, collaborative robotics, and machine learning applications.
  • Proven experience deploying reliable, high-availability systems.
  • Communication & Influence: Excellent written and verbal communication in French and English, capable of leading diverse principals – from junior members to senior executives.
  • Commitment: 100% dedication to Harmattan AI’s mission, vision, and ambitious growth plans, ready to go the extra mile to ensure operational excellence.

We look forward to hearing how you can help shape the future of autonomous defense systems at Harmattan AI.

json.companySlogan: Building the Future of Autonomous Warfare. With Speed and Intelligence.
json.companyDescription:
Harmattan AI is rising as a next-generation defense prime, building the future of autonomous warfare.
We leverage AI-driven autonomy, real-time intelligence, and conflict-ready production to deliver attritable systems and autonomous mission management software. 
Designed for the real-world needs of warfighters, our solutions enable faster deployment, sharper decision-making, and battlefield dominance.

json.title: QA Manager
json.descriptionHtml:
Yseop specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) and is a recognized pioneer in Natural Language Generation (NLG) technology. Yseop is rapidly expanding globally, providing enterprise-level automation solutions for some of the world’s largest companies in a variety of industries including finance , pharmaceuticals and computer software company .

With its multi award-winning Language AI technology, Yseop is revolutionizing the way analysis and reporting is done. Yseop’s powerful and user-friendly t platform allows business users to seamlessly and quickly build and automate the generation of text reports from any structured data.

At Yseop, our mission is to support companies through this digital transformation. We believe that our cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology allows businesses to increase the efficiency of their operations and shift employee time spent on tedious tasks to more value-added and creative work.

So join Yseop and be part of an amazing adventure that is only at its beginning!


Our corporate values drive our daily job:


  • Team : We care about each other, inspire each other and encourage strong team spirit
  • Trust: Trust is foundational. It empowers our employees and customer relationships.
  • Innovation: We love to innovate in ways that delight our customers
  • Customer Centric: We exceed customer expectations and aspire to create true partnerships.

We are building a diverse and inclusive team - and we need your help!

So join us to build tomorrow, today, 🚀


As part of our continued growth, Yseop has embarked on an ambitious security and IT transformation project to meet the evolving demands of our industry. To support this journey, we are strengthening our team with a QA Manager to help shape and implement our QA strategy. This role offers a unique opportunity to be a key player in a pivotal phase of our development.


👩 💻 Your mission :


As the QA Manager, you will

  • Lead and mentor a team of QA engineers (2 people).
  • Uniformization and standardization of Quality practices
  • Drive the release cycle
  • API Test development
  • Promote shift-left testing and early validation practices.
  • Collaborate with Product and Engineering managers to enhance testing strategies.
  • Develop test plans to achieve optimal functional and non-functional coverage.
  • Perform root-cause analysis and implement preventative test strategies.
  • Define and track key quality metrics.
  • Create and maintain automated tests to enhance coverage and reliability.


🧐 Your profile :


Requirements:


  • 5+ years of experience in developing and implementing Quality Assurance and test design strategies, ideally in the pharmaceutical industry or in a sector with strong regulatory constraints.
  • Proven leadership in establishing quality processes
  • Experience leading and mentoring a QA team (2 members).
  • Excellent cross-functional collaboration and communication skills.
  • Good level of English (written and spoken)
  • Good knowledge of GxP processes


Technical stack:

  • Unit test : Java (Springboot) / Junit / Typescript
  • APi Test : Postman
  • CI/CD : github, jenkins, nexus, …
  • Cypress / Datadog / Jira



🎁 Benefits to join Yseop?

  • A very strong company culture
  • Hybrid work policy
  • 1 day per year offered to do volunteer work in an association
  • An on- boarding tailored made to simplify your integration and meet all the teams
  • Team Building every quarter


Yseop is an equal opportunity employer. We believe diversity is a strength and fosters innovation. We are committed to enabling everyone to feel included and valued at the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, color, family, gender identity, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, social origin, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws.

json.companySlogan: The world’s most trusted digital colleague for regulatory writing
json.companyDescription: Yseop is the leader in Generative AI for regulated industries, changing the way content automation solutions are delivered with a human-centric, AI platform. Yseop is reimagining the future of scientific writing to get medicine into the hands of those who need it faster. With a suite of industry-specific applications and technology that blends symbolic, machine learning, and LLM techniques, Yseop ensures that even the most demanding content automation tasks are met with ease, scalability and application security across the entire enterprise.

json.title: AI Product Manager - Digital PM Consultant
json.descriptionHtml:
Location: Luxembourg


Do you want to start an ambitious and challenging career?

Would you like to work in an exciting and fun environment?

Do you thrive in work environments that push you to be your best?


TaleoConsulting is a management consulting group with offices in Luxembourg, Paris, Brussels, Amsterdam, Geneva, Zurich, Barcelona, Singapore, and Lisbon.


As a young and growing company, we now count over 400 employees across our 9 international offices! Our activities are primarily focused on finance, life science, retail, and energy.


What will you do?


We believe that we grow as our people grow. Motivated professionals make a difference. Not just for themselves, but also for our customers.


We are looking for people who share our corporate values among our local and international networks and promote close relationships with our customers and internal teams.

Taleo's success depends on the talent of its employees, therefore we are looking for an enthusiastic AI Product Manager - Digital PM Consultant :


  • Build and manage the AI roadmap for digital acquisition aligned with group objectives and frameworks
  • Identify benchmark and recommend innovative AI solutions that enhance SEO SEA campaign optimisation and advanced targeting
  • Support the deployment and evaluation of AI pilot initiatives to validate business value
  • Coordinate actions and ensure strong collaboration with Data Marketing Automation Web UX teams and partner agencies
  • Audit existing acquisition mechanisms across business units and propose AI driven improvement plans
  • Provide progress reporting on AI initiatives to key stakeholders
  • Support digital marketing teams in developing AI skills and new usage adoption
  • Ensure best practices in data management AI ethics and compliance including GDPR


How do we imagine our future AI Product Manager - Digital PM Consultant?

  • Proven experience in digital project management with strong expertise in acquisition channels such as SEO, SEA Social and Programmatic
  • Strong experience with AI technologies applied to marketing including generative AI NLP scoring and recommendation systems
  • Good knowledge of Insurance products and lyfecycle.
  • Strong understanding of data tracking attribution and CRM fundamentals
  • Knowledge of relevant AI tools and frameworks for digital marketing
  • Familiarity with project management methodologies such as Agile Scrum or Kanban
  • Strategic mindset with the ability to translate complex AI topics into actionable operational plans
  • Excellent communication and coordination skills able to operate effectively in a matrix organisation and simplify technical concepts
  • Analytical structured and highly results driven
  • Fluent French and English written and spoken


We hire great people and give them the playing field to become awesome!


Rather than a diploma or extensive experience, it’s your state of mind that will allow you to reach your potential and meet the target with Taleo!



Why should you join us?


You will be part of a talented and dynamic team! You will be able to benefit from career advancement and have the possibility to develop international and long-lasting work relationships.


If these words resonate with you and you identify with this description, send us your CV! We will be delighted to meet you.

Digital PM Consultant :Build and manage the AI roadmap for digital acquisition aligned with group objectives and frameworksIdentify benchmark and recommend innovative AI solutions that enhance SEO SEA campaign optimisation and advanced targetingSupport the deployment and evaluation of AI pilot initiatives to validate business valueCoordinate actions and ensure strong collaboration with Data Marketing Automation Web UX teams and partner agenciesAudit existing acquisition mechanisms across business units and propose AI driven improvement plansProvide progress reporting on AI initiatives to key stakeholdersSupport digital marketing teams in developing AI skills and new usage adoptionEnsure best practices in data management AI ethics and compliance including GDPRHow do we imagine our future AI Product Manager - Digital PM Consultant?Proven experience in digital project management with strong expertise in acquisition channels such as SEO, SEA Social and ProgrammaticStrong experience with AI technologies applied to marketing including generative AI NLP scoring and recommendation systemsGood knowledge of Insurance products and lyfecycle.Strong understanding of data tracking attribution and CRM fundamentalsKnowledge of relevant AI tools and frameworks for digital marketingFamiliarity with project management methodologies such as Agile Scrum or KanbanStrategic mindset with the ability to translate complex AI topics into actionable operational plansExcellent communication and coordination skills able to operate effectively in a matrix organisation and simplify technical conceptsAnalytical structured and highly results drivenFluent French and English written and spokenWe hire great people and give them the playing field to become awesome!Rather than a diploma or extensive experience, it’s your state of mind that will allow you to reach your potential and meet the target with Taleo!Why should you join us? You will be part of a talented and dynamic team! You will be able to benefit from career advancement and have the possibility to develop international and long-lasting work relationships.If these words resonate with you and you identify with this description, send us your CV! We will be delighted to meet you.
json.jobFunction: Consulting, Project Management, and Information Technology
json.industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Business Consulting and Services, and Financial Services
json.companySlogan: Meet The Target 🎯
json.companyDescription:
Taleo is a global independent management and delivery advisory group.

With offices in Luxembourg, Paris, Brussels, Amsterdam, Geneva, Barcelona, Lisbon, Zurich, and Singapore, Taleo Group provides its customers with tailored and innovative solutions. From a strategic approach to the operational implementation of projects and systems, we constantly seek to create value.

What makes us special is the combination of a unique blend of industry expertise, top level consultants, best-in-class transformation skills and a unique working culture.

EXPERTISE

Our financial expertise combined with our specialization in risk management, compliance, governance, processes management and financial information systems allow us to deliver best practices as well as tailored and innovative solutions to our clients.

There are five pillars to our activities and interventions:
-	Agile Governance & Project Management,
-	Business & Operations,
-	Processes & Change Management,
-	Digital Transformation & Data Management,
-	Finance, Risk & Compliance.

Taleo advises its customers with the best talents on the market. We select only highly-skilled professionals who become agile members of their organization and help our clients deliver more than the initial expectations.

VALUES

Our three values, Family, Fun and Excellence are at the core of our day-to-day activities and shape the way we interact with both our collaborators and our partners. We strive for excellence and we meet the target!

CSR

As a United Nations Global Compact company, we have committed to putting Human Rights, Labour, Environment and Anticorruption at the core of our strategies and operations. Taleo has been appointed Great Place to Work and is certified Ecovadis since 2020. 

JOBS

We are always on the lookout for talented people to enrich our culture and growing family. If you are a candidate, feel free to apply via our website!

json.title: Head of Data – Fast-Growing Consumer App - Paris - H/F
json.descriptionHtml:
They’re looking for a Head of Data to transform a massive stream of user data (25M+ users, billions of events) into a key driver of growth and AI innovation.


About the role


Reporting directly to the founders, you’ll define and execute the company’s data vision and strategy. You’ll shape the data stack, build a high-performing team, and turn data into a competitive advantage for international expansion and AI-driven product evolution.


Your mission

  • Lead the global data strategy aligned with business goals.
  • Build and scale a multidisciplinary team (Data Engineers, Analysts, Scientists, Fraud Analysts).
  • Ensure data reliability, accessibility, and compliance.
  • Oversee data infrastructure design, pipelines, and monitoring.
  • Drive data culture and empower all teams with actionable insights.
  • Lead projects in LTV modeling, personalization, fraud detection, and experimentation.
  • Accelerate the adoption of AI across product and operations.

Profile

  • 7+ years of experience in data, including 3+ in management.
  • Proven success structuring data teams in a B2C or scale-up environment.
  • Strong technical background (BigQuery, Airflow, DBT, Metabase, Amplitude or equivalents).
  • Deep understanding of analytics, data engineering, and data science.
  • Excellent leadership and communication skills.

Bonus

  • Experience in mobile or adtech.
  • Interest in applied AI (personalization, NLP, automation).
  • This is a unique opportunity to design a world-class data stack, lead a talented team, and shape the future of an AI-driven consumer platform.
  • Compensation: €100K–€150K, depending on experience.

json.companyDescription:
Hirestone est un cabinet de recrutement spécialisé dans les profils techniques, créé il y a deux ans et composé de chasseurs de têtes, passionnés par les métiers de la tech.
Nous accompagnons au quotidien les sociétés dont le cœur d’activité est technique, startups, scale-ups, éditeurs de logiciels. Nous les aidons à recruter leurs équipes techniques, en CDI et en freelance, partout en France.

Nous couvrons la totalité des postes qui ont un lien avec le secteur de la tech :

- Mobile
- Web
- Logiciel / Embarqué
- Data
- Infrastructure
- QA
- Design / Product
- Sales 
- Marketing

À chacun sa techno / son métier, à chacun son spécialiste !

json.title: AI Software Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
• Start
  • People
  • Jobs

Employee Log in Candidate Log in to Connect Homepage deepip.ai

Mail

Tech / Engineering

  • Paris
  • Hybrid

AI Software Engineer

About DeepIP

At DeepIP, our vision is to build the AI operating system for IP practitioners. Intellectual Property is not just legal paperwork—it’s a company’s strategic DNA. Yet today’s patent professionals are drowning in inefficient processes, outdated tools, and mountains of prior art.

We are building AI-powered assistants to radically transform the practice of IP: from drafting patents, to prosecution, and to searching prior art. Our products empower IP professionals to focus on strategy and creativity while AI handles the complexity.

2025 is just the beginning — we’re growing faster than ever and looking for bold, passionate people to join the ride. If you thrive in a fast-paced, flexible environment where every challenge sparks growth, come build the future with us. 🌟

The Role – AI Software Engineer

We are looking for an AI software engineer responsible for developing and maintaining AI systems, ensuring they are reliable, efficient, and aligned with end-user needs.

You will join a team of AI engineers working at the frontier of applied AI. Together, we’ll continuously push our AI stack to the state of the art, experimenting with the latest models, architectures, and techniques to deliver real impact to the IP professionals.

Your work will directly contribute to keeping DeepIP at the forefront of innovation — as the most advanced and trusted IP assistant on the market.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and maintain production-grade agentic AI systems integrating LLMs and custom models.
  • Develop robust components, including prompt management, post-processing, and RAG-based retrieval.
  • Ensure reliability and quality through testing, CI/CD, and Clean Architecture practices.
  • Monitor and optimize system performance, observability, and model behavior in production.
  • Collaborate with end users and the team to align technical decisions with product vision and continuously advance our AI stack.

Profile:

  • 2+ years of experience in software engineering, strong first experience in startups and/or strong educational background.
  • Proven hands-on experience in complex backend development and/or AI development using Python.
  • Proficiency with AI coding tools like Cursor, Github Copilot, Codex, …
  • Knowledge and experience with LLM SDKs and libraries (for example OpenAI, Anthropic, Google GenAI, LiteLLM, Langchain), and with LLM tracing (Langfuse or another solution).
  • Interest in Intellectual Property or willingness to learn about the domain.
  • Optional skills: knowledge of search systems, experience in Machine Learning / Deep Learning (particularly with NLP and/or Vision).

What we offer

  • Join an AI-first team tackling a very exciting challenge: the automation of the patent lifecycle.
  • Impact from day one: your work will power thousands of IP professionals worldwide.
  • A culture of collaboration, ownership, and rapid iteration.
  • Flexible working hours and work location, competitive compensation.

Recruitment process

  • HR call : get to know you !
  • Presentation interview with the Lead AI engineer
  • Technical interview: system design & live coding (1h30)
  • VP Eng & Co-founder interview.

Department Tech / Engineering Locations Paris Remote status Hybrid

Contact Lola Morel Peycelon Talent Partner – HR & Talent

About DeepIP

DeepIP was officially created in 2023, branching from our AI-focused sister company, Kili Technology.

DeepIP uses AI to unlock new levels of efficiency and value in IP practices.

By embracing AI, Gen AI, and the modern software stack, IP professionals can transcend the limitations of conventional processes and deliver exceptional services that protect and value innovation effectively.

Founded in 2023

Coworkers 25

Tech / Engineering

  • Paris
  • Hybrid

AI Software Engineer

json.companySlogan: Better Patents Faster
json.companyDescription:
DeepIP is your trusted AI patent assistant.

We unleash Gen AI so patent practitioners draft better patents faster and get more results.

We believe a revolution has started. The status quo is no longer an option. The day-to-day work of tomorrow's IP practitioners will be radically different. It will involve close collaboration with AI, which will handle the heavy work, propelling them towards excellence. 

Our mission is to free IP practitioners from tedious tasks enabling them to deliver greater value to their clients.

We collaborate with practitioners from the most prestigious IP law firms & corporations worldwide to lead this change.

Join us on this transformative journey as we revolutionize the world of Intellectual Property together!

json.title: EVP Head of Global In Silico and AI (all genders)
json.descriptionHtml:
The EVP, Head of Global In Silico and AI is a transformational executive leader responsible for shaping and executing Evotec’s global strategy for AI-driven in silico innovation in drug discovery. Leading cross-functional teams included within the In Silico Hub, as well as a Data Function, you will champion the integration of AI, computational science, and data-driven decision-making across the R&D continuum.

This is a high-impact, board-visible role with enterprise-wide influence — bridging science, technology, and strategy — to position Evotec at the forefront of AI-enabled drug discovery innovation.

As we reimagine how data and computation can accelerate drug discovery, this role is central to embedding AI and in silico methods as a core capability. You’ll lead the transformation from exploratory PoCs and a very scattered offering today to enterprise-scale solutions, building a unified digital backbone that fuels our competitive advantage on the market.

You'll work shoulder-to-shoulder with the global function leaders to ensure that AI and in silico science become key pillars of Evotec’s commercial value proposition.


Key Responsibilities

  • Define and own the global AI and in silico strategy, aligned to Evotec’s scientific vision and growth trajectory.
  • Establish a clear operating model that integrates data science, bioinformatics, AI/ML, and simulation across discovery and development stages.
  • Represent Evotec’s in silico innovation at executive, board, partner, and public levels.
  • Lead the evolution of the In Silico Hub from PoCs to scalable, end-to-end solutions for target ID, lead optimization, and translational science.
  • Oversee deployment of AI/ML models, molecular simulations, and data integration pipelines across R&D.
  • Advance use of multi-modal data, including omics, imaging, real-world data, and lab automation outputs.
  • Build and lead a multidisciplinary center of excellence, combining in silico science, data strategy, and platform engineering.
  • Guide the creation, implementation and evolution of a Data Function (incl. data governance, domain stewardship, data architecture, modeling, curation and product delivery) for united steering of data and use case delivery to create customer and client value; in close collaboration with a future Head of Data function.
  • Foster a matrixed leadership model that provides strategic direction of in-silico expert teams within adjacent operations functions.
  • Own the prioritization and resourcing model for AI/in-silico projects; serve as strategic gatekeeper through all innovation stages. Be responsible for long-term skills and capabilities demand management for in-silico/AI groups.
  • Govern the lifecycle of in silico tools and ensure alignment with business impact and ROI.
  • Partner closely with Translational Medicine, IT, Clinical, Regulatory, Operations, and Commercial teams to embed AI tools in workflows and GTM strategies.
  • Evaluate market trends and industry signals to steer AI investment toward competitive advantage.
  • Develop and select strategic partnerships. Lead external collaborations with academic institutions, AI providers, regulators, and digital consortia.
  • Ensure compliance with data privacy, FAIR principles, and regulatory expectations (FDA, EMA) through leadership and delegating this task to required SME’s.
  • Lead others to define and report KPIs to monitor performance, usage, and strategic value of in silico capabilities.


Knowledge & Experience

  • Min. MA/MsC, or PhD in Computational Biology, Bioinformatics, Computer Science, or related discipline
  • 10+ years of experience in AI/in-silico roles within biotech/pharma, with proven executive-level leadership
  • Strong background in computational drug discovery, including lead ID/optimization, translational modeling, or patient stratification
  • Deep understanding of ML/AI technologies, systems biology, data integration, and scaling tools from concept to product
  • Track record of building high-performing, cross-disciplinary teams
  • Strategic thinker with strong stakeholder engagement skills and experience in matrixed global environments
  • Recognized thought leader in AI for Life Sciences, with external visibility (publications, consortia, speaker roles)


Additional Experience

  • Experience in platform architecture, data governance, and regulatory alignment
  • Familiarity with FDA/EMA regulatory frameworks for in silico tools
  • Expertise in cloud-native platforms (AWS, Azure), high-performance computing, or federated data environments
  • Experience leading external partnerships (e.g., with startups, AI labs, or academic groups)
  • Knowledge of FAIR data principles and ontologies
  • Published in top-tier journals or patents in AI/in silico sciences


FR : Dans le cadre de sa politique Diversité, Evotec étudie, à compétences égales, toutes les candidatures dont celles des personnes en situation de handicap.

ENG : In the frame of our Diversity policy, Evotec considers, with equal competences, all applications including people with disabilities.

json.companySlogan: Pioneering Drug Discovery
json.companyDescription:
Evotec is a biotechnology company that is committed to advancing drug discovery and development. Through flexible business models, we collaborate with pharmaceutical companies, biotechs, foundations, and government agencies on a substantial scale. We believe that by working together, we can make a difference in the lives of patients.

Our Pipeline Co-Creation model represents our adaptable, multi-modality, fully integrated end-to-end approach to drive collaborations and services across all phases of drug discovery and development – from discovery of novel targets to achieving Proof of Concept in the clinic and into commercial manufacturing.

We aspire to contribute data-driven disease understanding and early disease relevance in humans to bring the probability of success up. We select the right modality, which is then propelled forward on our platforms by our passionate people striving for the fastest and most effective ways towards patient impact. This is enabled by convergence of human ingenuity with data and AI. 

We also offer specific solutions, products, and CRO/CDMO-like services, always in support of the Biopharma R&D innovator. Our more than 4,000 scientists work closely with numerous partners concurrently, delivering fully integrated research and development portfolios or individual projects with the highest quality standards and efficiency, coupled with great science, passion, engagement, and communication.

json.title: Test Automation Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.  

As Test Automation Engineer, you are involved in the automated verification and validation of products made by engineers in a development process. Your technical and professional knowledge of Test Automation, programming, test environments and methodologies is solid. With your knowledge and experience with one or more test tools and test techniques, you can independently design and execute test automation solutions. You follow the latest developments in your field and you know what is going on.

VOTRE RÔLE, VOTRE AVENIR

En tant que testeur automaticien / testeuse automaticienne, vous interviendrez dans un environnement agile sur l’ensemble des aspects liés aux métiers du test.

Vos principales missions seront :

  • Ecriture des campagnes de tests
  • Implémenter des tests API avec Cucumber et Postman
  • Saisie et suivi des anomalies dans Service Now
  • Analyse des problèmes et support à la recette
  • Préparation des environnement de tests
  • Rédaction de procédures d’exploitation
  • Communiquer les bilans des campagnes de tests
  • Concevoir les scénarios de tests ou scripts de tests automatisés
  • Identifier des pré-requis et jeux de données nécessaires à l'exécution des tests
  • Fiabiliser et rendre plus robustes les scripts d'automatisation

Environnement technique : Git, kubernetes, Jenkins, HP ALM, Service Now, Cucumber, Selenium

La certification ISTQB et la pratique dans un environnement Agile seront des atouts pour postuler sur ce poste.

De formation BAC +5, vous justifiez d'une première expérience dans le métier du Test Logiciel.

Organisé(e) et doté(e) d'un bon relationnel, votre rigueur et votre sens du service sont autant d'atouts qui vous permettront d'évoluer rapidement au sein de Sogeti.

LES PLUS DU POSTE

  • Intégrer une entreprise qui favorise l’épanouissement professionnel / personnel et partager des moments de convivialité entre collègues par le biais d’un CE attractif (voyages, tickets de cinéma...), afterworks et événements sportifs.
  • Réaliser de nombreuses formations : chez Sogeti au-delà des nombreuses certifications nous vous accompagnons sur la partie culturelle, environnementale et mobilité : permis bateau/moto, voyage linguistique, développement personnel, cours de pâtisserie...
  • Favoriser un équilibre de vie : accord de télétravail (jusqu'à 70%), aménagement du temps de travail, accord parentalité, et congés d’anciennetés (8 jours de congés supplémentaires)
  • Un complément de rémunération : prime de cooptation jusqu'à 3500€ ; possibilité d'actionnariat, prime d'intéressement et de participation et PERCOL avec l'abondement de l'entreprise !

3 RAISONS POUR NOUS REJOINDRE :

Qualité de vie au travail : accord de télétravail (jusqu'à 70%) en France et à l’international, accord sur l’égalité professionnelle, la parentalité, l’équilibre des temps et la mobilité durable.

Apprentissage en continu : certifications techniques et formations en libre accès, accompagnement sur mesure avec votre career manager, parcours d’intégration sur 9 mois.

Avantages groupe & CSE : plan actionnariat, PERCOL, CE attractif avec des tarifs préférentiels (voyages, concerts, tickets de cinéma...), remboursement partiel vacances, remboursement de votre abonnement sportif ou culturel et développement personnel (formations permis de conduire, cours de pâtisserie, nutrition...).

NOS ENGAGEMENTS ET PRIORITES :

Le groupe Capgemini encourage une culture inclusive dans un cadre multiculturel et handi-accueillant. En nous rejoignant, vous intégrez un collectif qui valorise la diversité, développe le potentiel de ses talents, s’engage dans des initiatives solidaires avec ses partenaires, et se mobilise pour réduire son impact environnemental sur tous ses sites et auprès de ses clients.

Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.

json.title: Pipeline TD (Maya / Python) – AI Animation Tools
json.descriptionHtml:
Mission

Shape and evolve our Maya-based animation pipeline through robust Python development, artist-centric tooling, and the seamless integration of our proprietary AI animation technologies into everyday production.

About The Role

At Animaj, we're pioneering the future of children's entertainment by blending creativity with cutting-edge technology.

To ensure that, we are looking for a Maya Pipeline TD / Animation TD with strong Python experience to develop tools and workflows used across layout, animation, rigging, and tech.

You will design and maintain Maya and ShotGrid tools, automate production tasks, support artists, and evolve our animation pipeline. You will also collaborate with the R&D team to integrate our proprietary AI animation models into everyday production workflows.

The role is based in Paris, in a hybrid setup.

Responsibilities:Maya & Pipeline Tool Development:

  • Develop, maintain, and improve Maya tools and Python-based plugins for animation, layout, and rigging teams.
  • Build Python automation scripts and pipeline processes that streamline workflows and eliminate repetitive tasks.
  • Collaborate with R&D to extend our Maya-based pipeline, integrate new Python modules, and ensure tools scale across productions.

AI Tool Integration:

  • Drive the technical integration of our proprietary AI animation tools (Sketch-to-Motion, Motion-in-Betweening) into production workflows.
  • Build tracking utilities in Maya to measure tool usage and quantify time savings from AI-assisted processes.

Production Workflow & Automation:

  • Design and implement automations to ensure seamless exchange of 3D assets between artists, production, and external vendors.
  • Suggest and prototype new tools and workflow improvements to enhance animation and CG production efficiency.
  • Ensure smooth operations within our cloud-based virtual studio (AWS AppStream/VDI).

Artist Support & Pipeline Reliability:

  • Provide day-to-day support by debugging technical issues in Maya, ShotGrid, and pipeline toolsets.
  • Work closely with artists to understand pain points and deliver tailored improvements and ad-hoc tools.
  • Around 7 years of experience as a Developer or Technical Director in a 3D Animation or VFX studio, ideally with exposure to series production.
  • Strong Python development skills, including automation, tool creation, plugins, and clean, modular code design.
  • Proven experience developing tools with the Maya Python API, OpenMaya, and PySide/PyQt.
  • Solid understanding of Maya environments: scene structure, rigs, caching, and animation workflows.
  • Hands-on experience with CG/Animation pipeline tools, including ShotGrid, asset/publish systems, and workflow orchestration.
  • Strong knowledge of 3D production processes, artist workflows, and 3D asset management.
  • Mastery of software engineering best practices: version control (Git), unit testing, documentation, and peer review.
  • Interest in and familiarity with AI applications in 3D animation.
  • Experience working in cloud-based production environments (VDI/AWS AppStream).
  • Bonus: familiarity with Blender or Unreal Engine.
  • Screening call with the Talent team - (30-45mins)
  • First call with Antoine (VP Engineering) - (45 mins)
  • Technical challenge
  • Focus interview with Antoine and Tristan (3D R&D Engineer) - 60 min
  • Final interview with Simon (SVP Production Innovation) & Sixte (CEO) - 30 min
