json.companySlogan: Liberating every part of your business with smarter, agile spending.
json.companyDescription:
Spendesk is the AI-powered spend management and procurement platform that transforms company spending. 

By simplifying procurement, payment cards, expense management, invoice processing, and accounting automation, Spendesk sets the new standard for spending at work. Its single, intelligent solution makes efficient spending easy for employees and gives finance leaders the full visibility and control they need across all company spend, even in multi-entity structures. 

Trusted by thousands of companies, Spendesk is proud to have over 200,000 users across France, the UK, Germany and Spain. 

Spendesk also puts community at the heart of spend management. Spendesk-backed CFO Connect is the largest finance community in Europe with more than 12,000 members. Learn more: http://www.cfoconnect.eu/

json.title: Freelance Software Developer (Ruby) - Quality Assurance (AI Trainer)
json.descriptionHtml:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. Please provide your resume in English and specify your proficiency level.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Coding, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Code generation and code review
  • Prompt evaluation and complex data annotation
  • Training and evaluation of large language models
  • Benchmarking and agent-based code execution in sandboxed environments
  • Working across multiple programming languages (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Rust, SQL, etc.)
  • Adapting guidelines for new domains and use cases
  • Following project-specific rubrics and requirements
  • Collaborating with project leads, solution engineers, and supply managers on complex or experimental projects

Note: Flexibility and quick adaptation to new requirements are essential.

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields.
  • You have at least 3 years of professional experience, including hands-on experience with Ruby testing frameworks (RSpec, Minitest, Capybara) and automation tools
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • Proficient with code review, quality analysis, and identifying/fixing code smells, anti-patterns, and test gaps in Ruby codebases
  • Experience with test integration in CI/CD environments (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, or CircleCI)
  • Experience using, integrating, or tutoring others with AI/ML or LLM-powered testing/coding solutions in Ruby projects
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker), automated deployment, and scripting within Ruby environments
  • Strong skills in defect documentation, profiling, and debugging Ruby applications
  • Experience generating and maintaining high-quality documentation for tests, bugs, and technical debt
  • Hackathon or competitive coding experience is a plus
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $52/hour depending on your skills, experience, and project needs
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companySlogan: Be the “I” in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects
json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift — a space where innovation meets opportunity. We’re a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks — ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let’s build the future of AI together, one task at a time.

json.title: Growth Marketer
json.descriptionHtml:
Important note:

Please consider submitting your CV and application in English, which is our working language at PhantomBuster.

This position will require regular, frequent visits to our office based in Bordeaux, France.

Note from the Hiring Manager

Hey 👋

I’m John, Head of Marketing at PhantomBuster. I joined almost four years ago as Chief of Staff and, over the last two, I’ve had the chance to build (what I consider) the dream Marketing team.

We’ve grown fast. Adina and Julia are our AI Content power duo, constantly experimenting, scaling content, and building automated workflows (supported by a dozen external writers) that push what’s possible in marketing.

Our Product Marketing team keeps the whole engine aligned. Diane sharpens our brand, positioning, and messaging so we stay bold and consistent, while Pedro is crafting an amazing PLG experience that helps users find real value from day one.

And then there’s Miquel, our Senior Growth Marketer and the OG of the team. He onboarded me, scaled our affiliate program from zero to seven figures in recurring revenue, and 8×’d our paid acquisition. He’s handled a thousand things at once and can’t wait to have a true partner in crime.

About PhantomBuster

PhantomBuster is a fast-growing SaaS company (+$13M ARR) helping sales teams automate lead generation. We’re now entering an exciting new phase: simplifying our product for SMBs while building a recognisable, creative brand presence for the 2+ million professionals who have used PhantomBuster.

Job Overview

We’re looking for a Growth Marketer (3+ years of experience) to help scale PhantomBuster’s acquisition channels through sharp execution and smart experimentation.

You’ll lead paid acquisition across Google Ads and Meta Ads, bring AI-powered automation into our workflows, and collaborate with Product Marketing, Design, and Data to accelerate growth.

This is a hands-on role for someone who loves performance data, creative testing, and finding new ways to acquire users efficiently.

What you’ll do

  • Manage and grow paid acquisition
  • Lead, with support from our Sr Growth Marketer, campaign strategy and execution across Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube) and Meta Ads (Facebook, Instagram).
  • Continuously refine targeting, bidding, and creatives to hit ROI and CPA goals.
  • Write and test high-converting ad copy and visuals using tools like Canva, Figma, or AI design assistants.
  • Build and optimize Webflow landing pages that convert; focusing on clarity, intent, and UX.
  • Experiment as needed with new Ad platforms (Reddit, LinkedIn).
  • Build AI-driven growth automation
  • Design and implement AI workflows to automate ad creation, audience testing, and reporting.
  • Integrate AI agents for campaign monitoring and creative iteration.
  • Use AI personalization to adapt content and landing pages dynamically to user behavior.
  • Collaborate on email and lifecycle automations in tools like Brevo or Customer.io, aligning acquisition with retention.
  • Build “AI Employees” as needed to support broader marketing efforts.
  • Turn data into decisions
  • Analyze performance data and share actionable insights with the team.
  • Build Looker Studio dashboards to visualize trends and track KPIs such as CTR, CPA, and ROAS.
  • Recommend next steps based on experiment results and user data.

What you bring to the table

  • 3+ years of experience in growth or performance marketing, focused on Google Ads and Meta Ads.
  • Proven record managing ad budgets above €20K/month.
  • Strong analytical mindset and ability to connect data to revenue outcomes.
  • Attention to detail & strong project management skills supporting move from scrappy startup to structured scale up.
  • Experience using AI tools to improve marketing efficiency or creative production.
  • Confident in copywriting and ad concept ideation for performance campaigns.
  • Experience with landing page builders (Webflow, Framer, or similar).
  • Comfortable with tools like Google Analytics and Looker Studio for performance tracking.
  • Fluent (C2) in English, both written and spoken.
  • Fast learner and analytical mindset — focused on revenue generation and improving key metrics.
  • (highly appreciated) Knowledge of B2B SaaS growth funnels or self-serve product-led acquisition.
  • (highly appreciated) Experience with lifecycle or CRM tools (Brevo, Customer.io).

What success looks like

  • Scalable paid acquisition systems that deliver sustainable ROI. If you suddenly had XXM€ - could you spend it efficiently and effectively?
  • Clear, actionable growth insights shared across the team.
  • Efficient AI automations reducing manual campaign work. Can we boost output without increasing headcount?
  • Improved conversion rates across ads and landing pages.
  • Developing or leveraging broader PLG Growth skillset.

Why you'll love working here

  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunity to grow within the role, with access to advanced AI tools and acquisition strategies.
  • PLG environment means a measurable business impact as ad clicks convert straight to customers.
  • Close mentorship and collaboration with a team (John, Miquel, Adina, Diane, Pedro, and Julia) that values creativity and experimentation.
  • Access to cutting-edge AI tools to streamline workflows and maximize campaign success.

Ready to grow with us?

If you’re driven by experimentation, love data, and enjoy turning AI into growth results: we’d love to hear from you.

Recruitment Process:

  • Screening Video Call with our Talent Partner, Jakub (45 minutes).
  • Job Fit Interview with Miquel and John (60 minutes).
  • Take-home Use Case Exercise followed by a Debriefing Interview with Miquel, Adina and one more Colleague from the Marketing team (60 minutes).
  • Culture Fit Interview with two Colleagues from other departments (60 minutes).

AI Guidelines

At PhantomBuster, we use AI tools daily to build things faster. As the use of AI in recruitment might have multiple implications, we want to be transparent about how we might use it and how we expect you to use it during our recruitment processes.

How we use AI:

  • Draft and refine job descriptions and case studies,
  • Draft emails during the process,
  • Find interview timeslots,
  • Summarize interview notes,

How we don't use AI:

  • Assess your CV or profile,
  • Evaluate interview performance,
  • Conduct interviews,
  • Grade technical tasks or case studies.

You interact with humans. Period.

We invite you to use AI throughout the recruitment process. However, we want to meet YOU, not machine-generated responses. Your unique perspective matters so much more than perfect AI answers.

Feel free to use AI to:

  • Research our company, team, or product,
  • Refine your CV, portfolio, or LinkedIn profile,
  • Prepare for interviews and brainstorm potential questions,
  • Polish your case study or presentation,
  • Draft emails to us,

Let us know throughout the process how you used AI - we are curious to learn.

Don't use AI to:

  • Search for answers during interviews (unless we ask),
  • Create documents (CV, portfolio, presentation) from scratch without your input,
  • Build case studies or technical tests without your personal touch.

If you have any questions, we would love to hear from you →

We’re now entering an exciting new phase: simplifying our product for SMBs while building a recognisable, creative brand presence for the 2+ million professionals who have used PhantomBuster.Job OverviewWe’re looking for a Growth Marketer (3+ years of experience) to help scale PhantomBuster’s acquisition channels through sharp execution and smart experimentation.You’ll lead paid acquisition across Google Ads and Meta Ads, bring AI-powered automation into our workflows, and collaborate with Product Marketing, Design, and Data to accelerate growth.This is a hands-on role for someone who loves performance data, creative testing, and finding new ways to acquire users efficiently.What you’ll do Manage and grow paid acquisitionLead, with support from our Sr Growth Marketer, campaign strategy and execution across Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube) and Meta Ads (Facebook, Instagram).Continuously refine targeting, bidding, and creatives to hit ROI and CPA goals.Write and test high-converting ad copy and visuals using tools like Canva, Figma, or AI design assistants.Build and optimize Webflow landing pages that convert; focusing on clarity, intent, and UX.Experiment as needed with new Ad platforms (Reddit, LinkedIn). Build AI-driven growth automationDesign and implement AI workflows to automate ad creation, audience testing, and reporting.Integrate AI agents for campaign monitoring and creative iteration.Use AI personalization to adapt content and landing pages dynamically to user behavior.Collaborate on email and lifecycle automations in tools like Brevo or Customer.io, aligning acquisition with retention.Build “AI Employees” as needed to support broader marketing efforts. Turn data into decisionsAnalyze performance data and share actionable insights with the team.Build Looker Studio dashboards to visualize trends and track KPIs such as CTR, CPA, and ROAS.Recommend next steps based on experiment results and user data.What you bring to the table3+ years of experience in growth or performance marketing, focused on Google Ads and Meta Ads.Proven record managing ad budgets above €20K/month.Strong analytical mindset and ability to connect data to revenue outcomes.Attention to detail & strong project management skills supporting move from scrappy startup to structured scale up.Experience using AI tools to improve marketing efficiency or creative production.Confident in copywriting and ad concept ideation for performance campaigns.Experience with landing page builders (Webflow, Framer, or similar).Comfortable with tools like Google Analytics and Looker Studio for performance tracking.Fluent (C2) in English, both written and spoken.Fast learner and analytical mindset — focused on revenue generation and improving key metrics.(highly appreciated) Knowledge of B2B SaaS growth funnels or self-serve product-led acquisition.(highly appreciated) Experience with lifecycle or CRM tools (Brevo, Customer.io).What success looks likeScalable paid acquisition systems that deliver sustainable ROI. If you suddenly had XXM€ - could you spend it efficiently and effectively?Clear, actionable growth insights shared across the team.Efficient AI automations reducing manual campaign work. Can we boost output without increasing headcount?Improved conversion rates across ads and landing pages.Developing or leveraging broader PLG Growth skillset.Why you'll love working hereCompetitive salary and benefits package.Opportunity to grow within the role, with access to advanced AI tools and acquisition strategies.PLG environment means a measurable business impact as ad clicks convert straight to customers.Close mentorship and collaboration with a team (John, Miquel, Adina, Diane, Pedro, and Julia) that values creativity and experimentation.Access to cutting-edge AI tools to streamline workflows and maximize campaign success.Ready to grow with us?If you’re driven by experimentation, love data, and enjoy turning AI into growth results: we’d love to hear from you.Recruitment Process:Screening Video Call with our Talent Partner, Jakub (45 minutes).Job Fit Interview with Miquel and John (60 minutes).Take-home Use Case Exercise followed by a Debriefing Interview with Miquel, Adina and one more Colleague from the Marketing team (60 minutes).Culture Fit Interview with two Colleagues from other departments (60 minutes).AI GuidelinesAt PhantomBuster, we use AI tools daily to build things faster. As the use of AI in recruitment might have multiple implications, we want to be transparent about how we might use it and how we expect you to use it during our recruitment processes.How we use AI:Draft and refine job descriptions and case studies,Draft emails during the process,Find interview timeslots,Summarize interview notes,How we don't use AI:Assess your CV or profile,Evaluate interview performance,Conduct interviews,Grade technical tasks or case studies.You interact with humans. Period.We invite you to use AI throughout the recruitment process. However, we want to meet YOU, not machine-generated responses. Your unique perspective matters so much more than perfect AI answers.Feel free to use AI to:Research our company, team, or product,Refine your CV, portfolio, or LinkedIn profile,Prepare for interviews and brainstorm potential questions,Polish your case study or presentation,Draft emails to us,Let us know throughout the process how you used AI - we are curious to learn.Don't use AI to:Search for answers during interviews (unless we ask),Create documents (CV, portfolio, presentation) from scratch without your input,Build case studies or technical tests without your personal touch.If you have any questions, we would love to hear from you → <your secret>

json.title: Senior Data engineer - Enterprise Analytics team - Italy or France
json.descriptionHtml:
This position is posted by Jobgether on behalf of a partner company. We are currently looking for a Senior Data Engineer - Enterprise Analytics team in Italy or France.

As a Senior Data Engineer on the Enterprise Analytics team, you will play a pivotal role in building, maintaining, and evolving a scalable data platform that supports critical business insights. You will design and deploy reliable data pipelines, collaborate across teams, and contribute to the continuous improvement of analytics processes. This role offers the opportunity to work in a fully remote environment while influencing data strategy, infrastructure, and tooling. Your expertise in Python, SQL, and modern data orchestration solutions will be essential to ensuring high performance, reliability, and innovation across enterprise analytics workflows. You will also mentor peers and help drive technical excellence across the organization, contributing to a culture of collaboration, automation, and measurable impact.

Accountabilities

  • Design, implement, and maintain reliable and scalable data pipelines that support diverse analytics needs
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business requirements and translate them into technical solutions
  • Maintain and improve the data platform, ensuring performance, reliability, and security using best DevOps practices
  • Proactively propose and implement improvements to analytics infrastructure, exploring innovative tools and approaches
  • Write clear technical documentation and communicate complex concepts effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
  • Mentor and support team members, sharing knowledge and promoting professional growth


Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience in backend or data engineering roles, with strong expertise in Python and SQL
  • Solid experience with data orchestration tools such as Dagster or Airflow
  • Experience designing, building, and maintaining scalable and reliable data pipelines and systems
  • Knowledge of cloud infrastructure (AWS, ECS Fargate, RDS/Postgres) and containerization
  • Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform
  • Deep understanding of data warehouses (e.g., Snowflake, Clickhouse)
  • Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills, capable of proposing suitable technical solutions
  • Excellent communication skills in English for collaboration across distributed teams
  • Ability to work autonomously, prioritize tasks, and manage time effectively
  • Experience with AI-driven automation, production deployments, and building real products is a plus


Benefits

  • Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package
  • Fully remote work with flexible arrangements
  • Generous paid time off and parental leave policies
  • Career development, mentorship programs, and opportunities to work on innovative projects
  • Wellbeing and home office allowances
  • Participation in virtual onboarding, hackathons, and global team events
  • Stock options or equity participation for full-time employees
  • Inclusive and supportive work environment with Employee Resource Groups

Jobgether is a Talent Matching Platform that partners with companies worldwide to efficiently connect top talent with the right opportunities through AI-driven job matching.

When you apply, your profile goes through our AI-powered screening process designed to identify top talent efficiently and fairly.

🔍 Our AI evaluates your CV and LinkedIn profile thoroughly, analyzing your skills, experience, and achievements.

📊 It compares your profile to the job's core requirements and past success factors to determine your match score.

🎯 Based on this analysis, we automatically shortlist the 3 candidates with the highest match to the role.

🧠 When necessary, our human team may perform an additional manual review to ensure no strong profile is missed.

The process is transparent, skills-based, and free of bias — focusing solely on your fit for the role.

Once the shortlist is completed, we share it directly with the company that owns the job opening. The final decision and next steps (such as interviews or additional assessments) are then made by their internal hiring team.

Thank you for your interest!

json.companySlogan: The AI-driven global platform to hire and get hired, efficiently. The right talent. The right job. Instantly connected.
json.companyDescription:
Job search is broken. Talents waste hours applying blindly, companies drown in irrelevant CVs.
Jobgether flips the model.
We’re an AI-powered career coach and matching platform helping people land remote and flexible jobs faster.
Jobgether designs your job search strategy, prepares you to stand out, and connects you only with roles that truly match.
Finding a job isn’t about applying to hundreds of listings anymore, it’s about having the right strategy and visibility to attract the right opportunities.

Purpose & Vision
Our purpose is to make remote job search guided, fast, and effective, reducing frustration and wasted effort for both talents and employers.
We envision a world where careers are built with intention, not luck.
Where flexibility is the norm.
Where no talent remains invisible.

Jobgether exists to ensure that every professional has a real chance to find the right remote job.

json.title: Technical Solution Consultant
json.descriptionHtml:
About the role:

The mission of Scibids Doubleverify is to provide media buyers with fully automated buying strategies for display campaigns, leading to unmatched performances for a minimum of human work.

As a Senior Sales Engineer, you will play a key role in the success of our most important customers by being recognised as the in-house expert who acts as the link between technical and business needs. You will work closely with the Account Management, Sales, Data Science and Product teams to provide the most reliable data points and context, in order for them to make the right strategic decisions and ensure our customers scale the Scibids usage while keeping the same quality standards.

This position will combine the ability to understand mathematical models, organization skills, relentless curiosity ("Sherlock" mindset), strong understanding of business priorities and an ambition for your work to become a real game changer!

The impact you will have :

  • Ensure the successful onboarding of our top customers by understanding their challenges, making sure the AI is set for success and reporting to the customers on the added value of our solutions.
  • Become the troubleshooting expert that AM team will rely on to identify any area of inefficiency on the campaigns activated with Scibids AI.
  • Identify how the product improvement and automation can help the Account Management team to scale the amount of business managed with the same workload. These recommendations will strongly impact the roadmaps of the other tech teams.
  • Build a clear picture of DoubleVerify Scibids' success rate on various typologies of campaigns and customers, in particular by building the necessary reporting tools and running post-mortem analysis on successful/failed onboardings.
  • Be the single point of contact between the Technical teams and The client facing teams, by owning the conversation and making sure both sides get the information they need to succeed in their missions.
  • Support the Account Management team by authoring training, documentation and how-tos.
  • Advise the Technical teams for the implementation and the testing plan of all the features they release for our Account Management team

What we look for :

  • Very analytical mindset, passionate about troubleshooting and ability to extract relevant business insights from a dataset. Experience of exposure to Data Science use cases would be preferable.
  • Strong understanding of business priorities and ability to make the data "talk" in the right way to support Scibids' messaging.
  • Ability to explain complex issues to a non-expert audience, both technical and client facing.
  • Passion for problem solving, identifying Account Managers pain-points and explaining important areas for business value to develop a trusted advisor skill set.
  • Familiarity working with both Client Facing and Technical team achieving tangible outcomes.
  • A first experience in the Ad Tech industry would be a plus.

Minimum qualifications:

  • Master degree in engineering or business French school or foreign universities.

Preferred qualifications:

  • 6 months+ experience in adtech
  • 3 years+ experience as a Data Scientist / Sales Engineer
  • One successful experience in relation to the business needs

Others :

  • Contract type: Full-time position (French "CDI")
  • Location : Paris, France
  • Report to : Director of Scibids Sales Engineering
  • Preferred availability: ASAP. We will however meet you even if you are not free right now

Scibids offers a dynamic, inclusive environment where innovation and teamwork are celebrated. If you are looking to make a significant impact in the digital marketing sphere and collaborate with a talented team towards groundbreaking achievements, we would love to hear from you.

DoubleVerify is a leading software platform for digital media measurement and analytics. Our mission is to help advertisers succeed. Learn more at www.DoubleVerify.com.

json.title: AI Content Manager
json.descriptionHtml:
Your Role

As AI Content Manager, you will be the architect of our creative ecosystem, combining strategic vision, hands-on content production, and AI-powered innovation. You’ll lead the design of content experiences, oversee production pipelines, and integrate AI tools to maximize efficiency, creativity, and performance.

You’ll work closely with our Head of Brand & Communication, shaping a workflow where human creativity and AI co-create content at scale.

Missions & Responsibilities

Strategy & Creative Leadership

  • Conceptualize, test, and scale innovative content formats (short-form storytelling, interactive experiences, immersive visuals, AI-assisted concepts).
  • Define and maintain editorial, visual, and AI-driven content guidelines to ensure consistency, efficiency, and brand alignment.
  • Lead creative brainstorming sessions leveraging AI-generated ideas to inspire new campaigns and formats.

Production & Workflow Optimization

  • Coordinate shoots and production, in-house, remote, or freelance, while integrating AI tools to accelerate editing, subtitling, and post-production.
  • Oversee content pipelines, centralize assets, and ensure smooth workflows for rapid iteration and delivery.
  • Implement AI-assisted project management to optimize timelines, budgets, and resource allocation.

Editing & Execution

  • Lead high-impact video editing for social media (short-form, mobile-first, fast-paced) with AI-assisted enhancements.
  • Supervise junior editors, freelancers, and AI tools, ensuring quality storytelling and visual excellence.
  • Apply advanced visual storytelling techniques and dynamic pacing to elevate every piece of content.

AI & Tech Integration

  • Explore, test, and implement state-of-the-art AI tools for content creation: scriptwriting, video generation, image/video enhancement, subtitling, and more.
  • Identify opportunities to automate repetitive tasks, freeing creative energy for strategy and experimentation.
  • Stay at the forefront of AI innovation, proposing new tools and workflows to the team.

Performance & Optimization

  • Monitor content KPIs (views, retention, conversion) and integrate AI-driven insights to refine formats.
  • Recommend iterative improvements, new angles, and cross-platform adaptations based on data and AI predictions.
  • Foster a feedback loop between AI insights, creative experimentation, and audience engagement.

Must-have

  • 3+ years of experience in content strategy, production, or creative leadership.
  • Passion for AI-driven creativity and familiarity with AI content tools (KlingAI, Runway, Pika Labs, etc.)
  • Strong video editing skills (Premiere Pro, CapCut, After Effects, or equivalent).
  • Proven ability to conceptualize and produce content for social media
  • Strong understanding of AI-assisted content workflows and automation.
  • Excellent visual and editorial storytelling sense.
  • Highly organized, autonomous, and collaborative.
  • Comfortable working in fast-paced, iterative environments.
  • Fluent in French and English.

💡 Bonus

  • Experience managing creators, UGC, or influencer collaborations.
  • Knowledge of branding, growth, or performance marketing.

json.title: Full-Stack Engineer - AI Security Products (Full time, Europe)
json.descriptionHtml:
This position is posted by Jobgether on behalf of a partner company. We are currently looking for a Full-Stack Engineer - AI Security Products in Europe.

As a Full-Stack Engineer, you will help build next-generation AI-driven security products that combine advanced automation, human expertise, and large language models. You will work across the stack, from backend services to intuitive front-end applications, collaborating closely with AI researchers, security engineers, and auditors. This role offers the opportunity to prototype, design, and deliver impactful tools in a fast-moving, startup-like environment. You will contribute to shaping the product roadmap, improving software safety, and ensuring high-performance solutions that scale. The position encourages innovation, autonomy, and continuous learning while operating in a globally distributed, remote-first team.

Accountabilities

  • Design, implement, and maintain full-stack AI-driven security products, including web apps and internal tools
  • Develop backend services and APIs using Python, Node.js, and TypeScript
  • Build responsive, user-friendly front-end interfaces using React and Next.js
  • Collaborate with AI researchers, auditors, and security engineers to translate ideas into functional products
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines, monitor system performance, and maintain cloud infrastructure on platforms such as AWS and Heroku
  • Integrate blockchain and smart contract interactions where applicable, using libraries like wagmi.js and ethers.js
  • Contribute to software quality, testing, and reliability practices across the development lifecycle
  • Support knowledge sharing and cross-functional collaboration within the engineering team


Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
  • 5+ years of full-stack development experience with large-scale applications
  • Proficiency in NextJS, React, Electron, Python, Node.js, and TypeScript
  • Strong understanding of AI agents, LLMs, and AI/ML frameworks (e.g., LangChain, OpenAI SDK)
  • Experience with SQL/Postgres and data-driven applications
  • Familiarity with blockchain environments and smart contract integration
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines, monitoring tools, and cloud platforms
  • Detail-oriented, quality-driven, and willing to learn continuously
  • Excellent English communication skills, both written and spoken
  • Able to overlap at least 4 hours per workday with SGT time zone
  • Nice to have: experience with DeFi applications, cybersecurity, whitebox auditing, or fluency in Mandarin


Benefits

  • Competitive salary with performance bonuses and token grants
  • 100% remote work with flexible working hours
  • Generous paid time off, including maternity/paternity leave
  • Retirement/pension plan
  • Free gym membership or virtual alternative of your choice
  • Option to rent a co-working space desk or work from anywhere
  • Participation in all-expenses-paid team retreats in exotic/exclusive locations

Jobgether is a Talent Matching Platform that partners with companies worldwide to efficiently connect top talent with the right opportunities through AI-driven job matching.

When you apply, your profile goes through our AI-powered screening process designed to identify top talent efficiently and fairly.

🔍 Our AI evaluates your CV and LinkedIn profile thoroughly, analyzing your skills, experience, and achievements.

📊 It compares your profile to the job's core requirements and past success factors to determine your match score.

🎯 Based on this analysis, we automatically shortlist the 3 candidates with the highest match to the role.

🧠 When necessary, our human team may perform an additional manual review to ensure no strong profile is missed.

The process is transparent, skills-based, and free of bias — focusing solely on your fit for the role.

Once the shortlist is completed, we share it directly with the company that owns the job opening. The final decision and next steps (such as interviews or additional assessments) are then made by their internal hiring team.

Thank you for your interest!

json.companyDescription:
Job search is broken. Talents waste hours applying blindly, companies drown in irrelevant CVs.
Jobgether flips the model.
We’re an AI-powered career coach and matching platform helping people land remote and flexible jobs faster.
Jobgether designs your job search strategy, prepares you to stand out, and connects you only with roles that truly match.
Finding a job isn’t about applying to hundreds of listings anymore, it’s about having the right strategy and visibility to attract the right opportunities.

Purpose & Vision
Our purpose is to make remote job search guided, fast, and effective, reducing frustration and wasted effort for both talents and employers.
We envision a world where careers are built with intention, not luck.
Where flexibility is the norm.
Where no talent remains invisible.

Jobgether exists to ensure that every professional has a real chance to find the right remote job.

json.title: SEA Specialist - (Search, YouTube, Display)
json.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

About

People joining Alan are always surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

  • Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.
  • Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.

🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

  • Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.
  • Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.
  • Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously

🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

  • Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.
  • Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally
  • Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches

⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

  • Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time
  • Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ The SEA Specilalist role ⭐️

⭐ Context ⭐

Alan's digital distribution, both for companies and individuals (freelancers, retirees, etc.), is experiencing strong growth (+45% annually), and we are planning for even more impressive growth in the coming years thanks to a strong brand and innovative distribution.

We are looking to scale our paid acquisition efforts by bringing in a dedicated expert to own and optimize one of our paid marketing channels.

⭐ Your mission ⭐

Your objective is to scale Alan's paid acquisition efforts, in order to succeed, you will:

  • Own and optimize Search, Performance Max, YouTube, and Demand Gen campaigns across all markets where we operate (France, Belgium, Spain)
  • Manage > 1M in annual SEA budget, ensuring efficient spend and strong ROI across markets
  • Test, iterate and scale holistic demand generation campaigns that align with Alan's ambitious goals and marketing OKRs
  • Collaborate with ad platform partners (Google, Microsoft, etc.) to stay at the forefront of paid trends
  • Transform pieces of content into multiple high-impact formats tailored to your channel
  • Partner with our talented performance marketers to create our next top advertising campaign, powered by AI and live shooting at the office
  • Partner within cross functional teams (Eng, Ops, Brand, Design…) in order to scale our campaigns
  • Make full use of AI and automation to maximise operational efficiencies
  • Contribute to define our strategy within the Paid Media team and work on international expansion: adapt and scale winning strategies across France, Belgium, Spain, and potentially new markets like Canada

⭐ If you have some of the following, you may be a great fit ⭐

  • Minimum 3-5+ years of experience in paid search or paid marketing
  • Fluent in English.
  • Proficiency with Google Ads (Search, Performance Max, Display, YouTube) / Bing
  • Strong analytical and data-driven approach
  • Experience in campaign creation, optimization and budget management
  • Ability to work autonomously and take ownership of projects
  • Creative mindset with test-and-learn approach

It is a big plus if you:

  • Are able to work in French, Dutch or Spanish as a second language
  • Have a first B2B experience
  • Have some experience managing multi-market, multi-language campaigns

For this role, we are looking to hire in the B1-C1 range.

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.
  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.
  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.
  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.
  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).
  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.
  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.
  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.
  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

json.companySlogan: You. Better.
json.companyDescription:
Alan is the health partner that insures, prevents, and supports daily.

Founded in 2016 and the first new health insurance player approved in France since 1986, Alan quickly became an essential health partner.

Offering a unique service focused on prevention and physical and mental well-being, Alan uses technology to simplify access to care.

In addition to its insurance offering, Alan provides innovative services like personalized prevention plans, a virtual clinic accessible 7/7, an online optical center, and many ongoing innovations.

These services achieve an exceptional customer satisfaction level (NPS of 68).

More than 710,000 members use Alan across 33,000 companies of all sectors and sizes.

With over 600 employees, Alan operates in France, Spain, Belgium, and Canada.

json.title: Freelance Software Developer (Ruby) - Quality Assurance (AI Trainer)
json.descriptionHtml:
This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. Please provide your resume in English and specify your proficiency level.

At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Coding, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.

Although every project is unique, you might typically:

  • Code generation and code review
  • Prompt evaluation and complex data annotation
  • Training and evaluation of large language models
  • Benchmarking and agent-based code execution in sandboxed environments
  • Working across multiple programming languages (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Rust, SQL, etc.)
  • Adapting guidelines for new domains and use cases
  • Following project-specific rubrics and requirements
  • Collaborating with project leads, solution engineers, and supply managers on complex or experimental projects

Note: Flexibility and quick adaptation to new requirements are essential.

How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields.
  • You have at least 3 years of professional experience, including hands-on experience with Ruby testing frameworks (RSpec, Minitest, Capybara) and automation tools
  • Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
  • Proficient with code review, quality analysis, and identifying/fixing code smells, anti-patterns, and test gaps in Ruby codebases
  • Experience with test integration in CI/CD environments (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, or CircleCI)
  • Experience using, integrating, or tutoring others with AI/ML or LLM-powered testing/coding solutions in Ruby projects
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker), automated deployment, and scripting within Ruby environments
  • Strong skills in defect documentation, profiling, and debugging Ruby applications
  • Experience generating and maintaining high-quality documentation for tests, bugs, and technical debt
  • Hackathon or competitive coding experience is a plus
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge

Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Get paid for your expertise, with rates that can go up to $52/hour depending on your skills, experience, and project needs
  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companySlogan: Be the “I” in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects
json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift — a space where innovation meets opportunity. We’re a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks — ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let’s build the future of AI together, one task at a time.

json.title: Global Mobility Expert, France
json.descriptionHtml:
Company Description

Are you experienced in corporate relocation, and wanting to be driving the future of the industry, as part of a fast growing, AI technology driven Immigration company?

You can join us as a contractor and also bring your current cases to our platform to make the whole process more easy for you and your clients.

Moving to a new country is as easy as booking a flight!

Jobbatical is using AI and automation to make the employee visa and relocation process faster and less expensive, so businesses can hire whoever they want, from wherever they want. Jobbatical today is the go-to immigration and relocation partner for tech startups and traditional companies alike. Our team is on a mission to make moving to a new country as easy as booking a flight. The best way to do that is by making the hardest part of relocating to another country – immigration – ridiculously easy.

We help clients like N26, Pipedrive, and Travelperk to relocate people to 30+ countries and are backed by some of the best investors in the world including Union Square Ventures, Inventure, Karma VC, Swiss Post Ventures, et al.

Job Description

What you can do on the platform:

  • Assist and manage relocation cases, including designing relocation process, preparing immigration related documentation, communicating with partners, clients, talents, Embassies and Government institutions
  • Provide relocation related consultations for clients and talents
  • Build and maintain relocation processes, workflows and guidelines
  • Assist and manage immigration and relocation-related projects
  • Manage the settle-in services
  • Support your colleagues with immigration-related information preparations
  • Help customizing our platform according to the country’s needs

Qualifications

What helps you to succeed in partnering with us:

  • experience and knowledge in EU and non-EU immigration to France, including dealing with French immigration authorities
  • French speaker, but are also a fluent communicator in English. Other languages are a plus
  • comfortable with working remotely and independently
  • comfortable with working with IT solutions
  • knows how to prioritise & focus, disciplined
  • an excellent communicator in person and over written correspondence
  • have project management skills like independence in running your work, are keen to take initiative, are good with strict timelines, and have strong attention to detail

Additional Information

Why Join Jobbatical?

We are a diverse and growing team of 40 people, currently delivering in-house immigration across Europe.

Innovative Environment: Be part of a forward-thinking team that's redefining global mobility

Growth Opportunities: Expand your skills and grow with a company that's scaling rapidly

Impactful Work: Play a key role in shaping global mobility processes and contributing to our success

You can learn more about the company and the team here: https://jobbatical.com/about

Our offer to you includes:

  • Solid compensation package
  • Possibility to work among passionate professionals who change the world of immigration
  • A lot of international challenges to help you grow and thrive

We’re an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

json.companySlogan: Your all-in-one employee relocation solution, from immigration to settling in and renewals.
json.companyDescription:
Jobbatical makes employee relocation easy by combining AI technology with the best human expertise. 
Our smart software automates the most time-consuming aspects of immigration, while our dedicated team of local specialists guarantees personalized guidance and support throughout the entire relocation journey.
We handle the paperwork, minimize stress and give you back time to focus on what matters most: your team.

json.title: Content Strategist, Producer & Editor
json.descriptionHtml:
As Content strategist, producer & editor, you will be the conductor of our content ecosystem. Both strategic thinker and hands-on creator, you’ll develop content formats, oversee (and execute) editing, and ensure every piece of content is on-brand, high-performing, and delivered efficiently.

You’ll collaborate with our Head of Communication, while leveraging AI and automation to accelerate production.

Strategy & Creative Direction

  • Design and iterate scalable content formats (stories, interviews, before/after, etc.)
  • Build and maintain editorial and visual guidelines
  • Ensure brand consistency across platforms and formats

Production & Coordination

  • Coordinate shoots (in-house, remote, or freelance)
  • Manage planning, budgets, and delivery timelines
  • Oversee content pipelines and centralize production assets

Editing & Execution

  • Edit videos for social media (short form, mobile-first, fast-paced)
  • Supervise junior editors, freelancers, and AI tools
  • Apply visual storytelling and dynamic pacing to elevate content

AI & Tool Integration

  • Use and test AI tools for content generation (copy, edit, subtitling, etc.)
  • Identify automation opportunities to streamline production

Performance & Optimization

  • Monitor content KPIs with the growth team (views, retention, conversion)
  • Recommend format adaptations or new editorial angles
  • Contribute to feedback loops based on performance data

Must-have

  • 3+ years of experience in content strategy and production
  • Strong video editing skills (Premiere Pro, CapCut, or equivalent)
  • Knowledge of social media content formats (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts)
  • Great sense of visual and editorial storytelling
  • Autonomous, organized, and collaborative
  • Comfortable in a fast-paced and iterative environment

💡 Bonus

  • Experience managing creators, UGC, or influencer collaborations
  • Familiarity with AI tools
  • Background in branding, growth, or performance marketing
  • Fluent in French and English

json.title: Senior Vice President of Engineering [gn] Zeenea
json.descriptionHtml:
Actian is a global leader in hybrid data management, cloud data warehousing, and data integration technologies. Trusted by world-class organizations such as Bloomberg, Intuit, Lufthansa, and Citibank, we empower businesses to tackle their most complex data challenges and drive transformation through innovative solutions.


As part of the Actian and HCL Software family, Zeenea France, headquartered in Paris, is experiencing rapid growth. We are seeking a Senior Vice President of Engineering to lead and inspire our engineering organization in building world-class data intelligence solutions that make complex data simple, trusted, and accessible.


In this executive role, you will be responsible for shaping the technical vision, driving engineering excellence, and ensuring seamless alignment between product strategy and execution. You will work closely with cross-functional leaders across product, design, and architecture to deliver scalable, high-quality software solutions powering Zeenea’s global data platform.


You will join a dynamic, high-growth environment, where your leadership will directly influence team performance, product quality, and the overall engineering culture. As a strategic and hands-on leader, you will guide teams in adopting modern architectures, best practices, and efficient development processes to accelerate delivery, foster innovation, and uphold Actian’s commitment to engineering excellence.


Responsibilities - Strategic & Technical Leadership:


  • Define and execute the engineering vision and strategy in alignment with company objectives and product roadmaps.
  • Partner with the CPTO and Product leaders to drive the successful delivery of innovative, high-quality, and secure solutions.
  • Oversee the technical strategy for AI, connectivity, and cloud operations, ensuring scalability and performance.
  • Lead transformation initiatives that evolve engineering processes, tools, and culture to meet global scale demands.



Responsibilities - Organizational Leadership & Scaling:


  • Build and scale a world-class engineering organization across multiple geographies.
  • Develop strong leadership within the engineering function, mentoring senior managers and fostering a high-performance culture.
  • Establish organizational structures, processes, and metrics that enable predictable, efficient, and scalable software delivery.
  • Drive talent acquisition and retention strategies to support growth and innovation.


Responsibilities - Execution & Delivery Excellence:


  • Ensure delivery excellence across product development, AI initiatives, quality engineering, and cloud operations.
  • Champion modern engineering practices, including copilots, CI/CD, DevOps, observability, and automation.
  • Maintain focus on reliability, performance, and security across all technology layers.


Responsibilities - Stakeholder & Cross-Functional Collaboration:


  • Collaborate with Product Management, Architecture, and Operations to ensure end-to-end alignment on priorities and execution.
  • Communicate technical vision, progress, and risks clearly to executive stakeholders and, when required, the Executive Leadership Team.
  • Engage with key customers and partners to support technology strategy and integration initiatives.


Required Skills:


  • 20+ years of experience in software engineering, with at least 8 years in senior executive leadership roles.
  • Proven track record of scaling large, distributed engineering organizations in fast-growing software or SaaS environments.
  • Deep expertise in cloud-native architectures, AI/ML integration, connectivity, and modern DevOps practices.
  • Strong experience managing multi-disciplinary teams (engineering, quality, operations) across international locations.
  • Exceptional leadership, organizational design, and stakeholder management skills.
  • Fluency in English (both written and spoken) is required. Knowledge of the French language is a plus.
  • Based in Europe, with the ability to collaborate effectively across global time zones.
  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (MBA or equivalent experience a plus).


What We Offer:


  • The chance to be part of an innovative, fast-growing company making a significant impact in the data management space.
  • Collaboration with a passionate and diverse team.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Flexible work arrangements (remote or hybrid).
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development.



Why Join Us?At Zeenea and Actian, we are passionate about innovation and teamwork. This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a dynamic environment, loves creating an efficient and welcoming workspace, and enjoys working closely with a talented team.


Interested?We’d love to hear from you! Let’s discuss how you can contribute to our success while growing your career with us.


We value diversity at our company. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or any other applicable legally protected characteristics in the location in which the candidate is applying.

json.title: Growth & AI automation Intern - (F/H) - January 2026
json.descriptionHtml:
Started in France in 2016, Mytraffic mission is to empower commerce professionals with the best location analytics and insights to be smarter every day and design the best experiences in physical locations.

We already serve more than 500 customers in many different sectors (Retail, Real Estate, Consulting Companies, Cities…) all over Europe to help them expand their businesses, analyze or predict performances of investments, understand their customers’ habits, benchmark their results with competition… Mytraffic is a hyper growing scale up (+110%/year) supported by a 30 Millions € Series B fundraising round with Axa Venture Partners, Alven and Kernel Investissements in November 2022 to finance its European expansion.

In January 2024, Mytraffic announced the strategic acquisition of the Spanish start up Geoblink, becoming Europe's premier location intelligence platform.

In a time of technological transition (AI boom), we’re launching our “Sales level up” plan to transform our Sales team into a high-performing powerhouse. The role of Lead Generation Manager will be key in driving this transformation.

🚀 Join an ambitious and supportive Lead Gen Team

From day one, you’ll be coached by our Head of Lead Gen and a Lead Gen expert, who will support your growth and help you ramp up quickly.

You’ll also be part of a real lead generation squad, working closely with another Lead Gen intern to build and scale our prospecting machine together.

🌟 Be a key player in our AI-powered GTM transformation

We’re rebuilding our Go-To-Market engine from the ground up with automation, AI, and data at the core.

As a Growth & AI automation, you’ll be at the heart of this transformation, helping us shape a smarter, more scalable lead generation machine.

You’ll work closely with our Revenue Ops, Sales, and Growth teams to design and implement AI-driven workflows that generate highly targeted and actionable lead lists, fueling our sales teams with precision.

It’s an opportunity to test the latest tools, automate manual flows, and help define the future of B2B acquisition.

🔍 What you’ll Do: Build & Run

Work closely with Sales on a day-to-day basis to sharpen targeting, sources, and personas

Build high-quality lead lists using our full stack: CRM, tools like Clay, and intent-based or ABM strategies

Design scalable approaches to reduce reliance on manual tasks

Set up automated workflows for lead capture, qualification, and handoff to the right teams

Experiment with cutting-edge automation and AI tools (Clay, GPT, Zapier, Phantombuster…) to eliminate repetitive work and spot weak signals

Continuously optimize our lead gen engine from detection to conversion

Contribute to the structuring and documentation of acquisition processes

✅ What You’ll Learn

How to deploy a modern, scalable, AI-centric lead generation strategy

How to build and automate systems to generate, qualify, and route leads

How to drive real business impact in a fast-paced environment

Key B2B techniques like ABM, intent data, and behavioral scoring

🧠 Who you Are

Curious, resourceful, and comfortable with digital tools

You love to test, automate, and iterate quickly

Understanding of B2B, sales cycles, and digital marketing

Comfortable working with data (Sheets/Excel, no-code tools, CRM, maybe even SQL)

Analytical, detail-oriented, and results-driven

Bonus: familiarity with scraping, APIs, enrichment logic, or AI tools

In your last year of business, digital or web school

You’re fluent in French and English

🙌 Why Join Us?

A strategic role at the core of our sales engine

Full ownership: test fast, iterate freely, make a real impact

Work with a forward thinking team that values responsibility and innovation

Learn and grow on tools like Clay, Lemlist, Hubspot, GPT, Zapier & more

Build skills that are highly sought-after in today’s AI-powered B2B landscape

⚙️ The Recruitment Process

1️⃣ 30 min with Alex, Head of Lead Generation

2️⃣ 30 min with Pauline, Deputy CRO

3️⃣ 45 min Business case

Nous dotons le monde physique des pouvoirs du numérique.

MyTraffic est une plateforme qui aide les organisations à prendre de meilleures décisions d'investissement plus précises et plus sûres pour leurs lieux physiques.

json.companySlogan:
Make Smarter Location Decisions. 
MyTraffic provides precise, real-time information on any physical location in Europe.
json.companyDescription:
Make Smarter Location Decisions 🚀

MyTraffic provides precise, real-time information on any physical location in Europe. Our platform transforms data into actionable insights (footfall, vehicle flow, visitor profiling) while ensuring GDPR compliance.

We work with more than 600 companies and support sectors like Retail, Real Estate, Consulting, Cities, Consumer Goods or Advertising. MyTraffic helps businesses expand operations, increase asset performance, optimize marketing, and benchmark against competitors.

We secured €40 Million in fundings with Alven and Axa Venture Partners.

Discover our impact in client success stories: https://www.mytraffic.io/en/clients

Stop Guessing. Start Knowing.

MyTraffic. Make Smarter Location Decisions.

json.title: SEA Specialist - (Search, YouTube, Display)
json.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

About

People joining Alan are always surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

  • Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.
  • Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.

🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

  • Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.
  • Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.
  • Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously

🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

  • Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.
  • Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally
  • Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches

⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

  • Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time
  • Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ The SEA Specilalist role ⭐️

⭐ Context ⭐

Alan's digital distribution, both for companies and individuals (freelancers, retirees, etc.), is experiencing strong growth (+45% annually), and we are planning for even more impressive growth in the coming years thanks to a strong brand and innovative distribution.

We are looking to scale our paid acquisition efforts by bringing in a dedicated expert to own and optimize one of our paid marketing channels.

⭐ Your mission ⭐

Your objective is to scale Alan's paid acquisition efforts, in order to succeed, you will:

  • Own and optimize Search, Performance Max, YouTube, and Demand Gen campaigns across all markets where we operate (France, Belgium, Spain)
  • Manage > 1M in annual SEA budget, ensuring efficient spend and strong ROI across markets
  • Test, iterate and scale holistic demand generation campaigns that align with Alan's ambitious goals and marketing OKRs
  • Collaborate with ad platform partners (Google, Microsoft, etc.) to stay at the forefront of paid trends
  • Transform pieces of content into multiple high-impact formats tailored to your channel
  • Partner with our talented performance marketers to create our next top advertising campaign, powered by AI and live shooting at the office
  • Partner within cross functional teams (Eng, Ops, Brand, Design…) in order to scale our campaigns
  • Make full use of AI and automation to maximise operational efficiencies
  • Contribute to define our strategy within the Paid Media team and work on international expansion: adapt and scale winning strategies across France, Belgium, Spain, and potentially new markets like Canada

⭐ If you have some of the following, you may be a great fit ⭐

  • Minimum 3-5+ years of experience in paid search or paid marketing
  • Fluent in English.
  • Proficiency with Google Ads (Search, Performance Max, Display, YouTube) / Bing
  • Strong analytical and data-driven approach
  • Experience in campaign creation, optimization and budget management
  • Ability to work autonomously and take ownership of projects
  • Creative mindset with test-and-learn approach

It is a big plus if you:

  • Are able to work in French, Dutch or Spanish as a second language
  • Have a first B2B experience
  • Have some experience managing multi-market, multi-language campaigns

For this role, we are looking to hire in the B1-C1 range.

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.
  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.
  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.
  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.
  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).
  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.
  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.
  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.
  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

json.companySlogan: You. Better.
json.companyDescription:
Alan is the health partner that insures, prevents, and supports daily.

Founded in 2016 and the first new health insurance player approved in France since 1986, Alan quickly became an essential health partner.

Offering a unique service focused on prevention and physical and mental well-being, Alan uses technology to simplify access to care.

In addition to its insurance offering, Alan provides innovative services like personalized prevention plans, a virtual clinic accessible 7/7, an online optical center, and many ongoing innovations.

These services achieve an exceptional customer satisfaction level (NPS of 68).

More than 710,000 members use Alan across 33,000 companies of all sectors and sizes.

With over 600 employees, Alan operates in France, Spain, Belgium, and Canada.

Your objective is to scale Alan's paid acquisition efforts, in order to succeed, you will:

  • Own and optimize Search, Performance Max, YouTube, and Demand Gen campaigns across all markets where we operate (France, Belgium, Spain)
  • Manage > 1M in annual SEA budget, ensuring efficient spend and strong ROI across markets
  • Test, iterate and scale holistic demand generation campaigns that align with Alan's ambitious goals and marketing OKRs
  • Collaborate with ad platform partners (Google, Microsoft, etc.) to stay at the forefront of paid trends
  • Transform pieces of content into multiple high-impact formats tailored to your channel
  • Partner with our talented performance marketers to create our next top advertising campaign, powered by AI and live shooting at the office
  • Partner within cross functional teams (Eng, Ops, Brand, Design…) in order to scale our campaigns
  • Make full use of AI and automation to maximise operational efficiencies
  • Contribute to define our strategy within the Paid Media team and work on international expansion: adapt and scale winning strategies across France, Belgium, Spain, and potentially new markets like Canada

⭐ If you have some of the following, you may be a great fit ⭐

  • Minimum 3-5+ years of experience in paid search or paid marketing
  • Fluent in English.
  • Proficiency with Google Ads (Search, Performance Max, Display, YouTube) / Bing
  • Strong analytical and data-driven approach
  • Experience in campaign creation, optimization and budget management
  • Ability to work autonomously and take ownership of projects
  • Creative mindset with test-and-learn approach

It is a big plus if you:

  • Are able to work in French, Dutch or Spanish as a second language
  • Have a first B2B experience
  • Have some experience managing multi-market, multi-language campaigns

For this role, we are looking to hire in the B1-C1 range.

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.
  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.
  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.
  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.
  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).
  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.
  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.
  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.
  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.
